Review Text: I was skeptical, but the ingredients all have published scientific studies backing them so I figured for roughly $3.00 per hangover, I’ll give it a try. (I would pay $300 to get rid of some of my hangovers). Drank heavily, took 3 caps at night before bed. Usually wake up with heart palpitations, nausea, sweating, headache etc. used twice so far and I have only woken up tired. You definitely still feel like you drank, but this is the absolute only product I’ve tried that has quelled the symptoms of a hangover. A must have, from someone in the medical field. *Not Medical advice
Review Title: You definitely still feel like you drank

Review Text: I hesitated to actually leave a review for this product, as my public and very actual name is here for all to see. I wouldn’t want anyone to think I’m a secret boozehound and nursing a daily hangover. I felt compelled to review this product,however, after seeing the very few negative reviews (especially the one that has the nerve to site other sites/products) since i know how important reviews are to me on this site. I like to have a drink or two at night on occasion. I eat the majority of my food in the day, and I am slight in stature-so this occasionally causes me to wake up feeling “soggy”, not hungover, but not feeling great or even good. I saw an ad for this product on instagram of all things, and after reading reviews here, I ordered a bottle. Ive had it for close to a week, i drank 2 nights out of that week and both nights i took thrive before bed and the results are truly undeniable. I didnt feel slightly nauseous, i didnt feel kind of headachy, i felt great. I have already recommended this to a few friends and am DEFINITELY going to order again when i am down to a few doses. This is a great product.
Review Title: I dont plan to ever be without this again if i can help it.

Review Text: I purchased this product a bit reluctantly as it was recommended by a coworker who swears by it. I’ve tried these alocohol recovery products in the past (AKA charcoal tablets) as I can drink with the best of them but my recovery time can only be described or compared to waiting at the DMV or on hold with the post office trying to recover a lost package. Now, the reason I bought this was for a recent bachelor party to Las Vegas that I knew would be full of booze and shenanigans...The first night out that I took it was a fairly mild drinking night. We started with a few beers and eventually a few bottles of Jameson. Now, this product is great, but when you’re 38, out of shape, and don’t party much anymore this was an apocalyptic amount of consumption. I felt the ginger root kick in about the time I was hanging over the rail vomiting into the Belagio Fountains.. shortly after this I felt the vitamins B, C, and E kick in about the time we were running down the strip trying to outrun a a lovely fellow and his 2 female employees who apparently wanted us to pay for the taxi ride from a club (Not a stripper club Mom.) They May have been his sisters) He was certainly concerned with the gap wage everyone’s been talking about lately, by the time we made it back to the Hardrock I felt like a million bucks!  Well, $999,945.00 as I had run smooth out of one of my leather slippers! Needless to say, a short nap and we were ready to hit the pool the next morning which conveniently enough was called Rehab. Mahalos!!

I am a healthy female that normally does not have issues with health supplements. However I heard about this product on Instagram from a follower. I purchased and started taking 1-2 capsules at night after 1-2 cocktails. I noticed after a week I had blood in my stool.. I racked my head to figure out what this could be from.... (I have medical schooling background so very familiar with the human body ) NOTHING in my diet has changed, nothing in my (potty breaks) has changed, Nothing new besides this product.. Soooo I stopped taking it to see if that was the true case and It was! I have been off of it for 4 days and I am back to normal... Please be careful with taking this product. Pay close attention to your body and how it reacts if taking this supplement!!!!

This is serious magic. Literally Gandalf made these pills so I can drink and be merry even the next day. I can honestly say I haven't had a hangover since taking these pills. I would say I am a medium drinker (Thurs - Sat) beer and wine and when taking Cheers, It's like my mind is confused that my body doesn't feel like doggie doo.In fact just the opposite. I have already got my neighbors hooked on it as it is a must have if you like to imbibe :)oh and if you want a super combo: 2 Advil, 3 Cheers, 2 Glasses of water before bed = Next Day Hero

Did not work one bit.  I had 3 glasses of wine early in the evening (which is a lot for me) took 3 Thrive capsules within an hour and went to bed early.  Next morning I felt just as I do any other time I drink wine:  headache, slightly upset stomach, and foggy.  I was encouraged by all of the positive reviews but now I wonder if they were actual public reviews.  The manufacturer must be laughing at people like me all the way to the bank!  The only way to avoid the effect of alcohol is to avoid alcohol otherwise you need to suck it up and deal with the headache.

I have tried many alcohol support supplements and this one is a complete waste of money. It does not work and although the packaging is fancy and I had high hopes since the company was  on SharkTank, the product is garbage. I have used Drinkwel, tried my own  mix of vitamins and minerals, and even used  Emergen-C, and everything else works much better(but Drinkwel  is the best I have found, and no I do not work for that company).. I am convinced that the label with vitamin concentrations is not truthful as other supplement  state similar ingredients and they actually do work and cause my urine to be neon, which this product did not. Do not bother with this product. I wish it worked but it appears they spend more money of the packaging than the actual vitamin.

I definitely think these work. I'm less frequently hungover, even if only sleeping better so I'm less groggy the next day. The amount of alcohol I drink and food/water intake still matter, but I was getting hungover even despite trying to hydrate and not overdrink (oh how I hate aging), so this makes me less anxious about having more than 2 or 3 drinks. My main issue is how few pills are in the bottle. There is a lot of empty space, and it only has 30 pills. If you take 3 as a serving, that's only 10 servings, which runs out super fast. At least offer these in bulk??
Review Title: they work but I wish more came in a bottle

Review Text: The morning after a night out with my friends I was feeling miserable and this product popped up on my feed. I thought what’s the worst that could happen if I bought it? Maybe it’d work and I’d feel better or maybe it wouldn’t. Well boy was that the best $30 I ever spent. I used it for the first time this past weekend and woke up feeling better than I ever had. I was a little groggy at first but within the hour it felt as if I hadn’t even drank. This is by far the best product I have used when it comes to hangovers and it’s not even close. I would highly recommend this to anyone who’s looking to feel brand new after a night of drinking!

i gotta give it the credit it deserves, this stuff will be a game changer for many people, particularly for things like karaoke nights, bachelor(ette) parties, Vegas trips, etc.! here's my quick thoughts:does it entirely cure a hangover? no.does it make you feel SIGNIFICANTLY better after a night of drinking than you would have if you had just had water and aspirin? absolutely.in my limited experience with this, the only real con is that it's a bit expensive at $30/bottle, especially if you take 3 caplets each time like they recommend. BUT, if you think about it as the per usage cost, i think most people would gladly pay $3 to not feel completely miserable after a long night of drinking.some personal observations:- i've taken this with very little water at the end of the night and yet it somehow manages to assist in preventing miserable headaches that usually occur without proper hydration. this is a giant plus, and means you don't have to rely on any over-the-counter pain relievers i know many people don't like taking, particularly given the warnings that accompany most when it comes to alcohol consumption, etc.- i haven't had an insane night (i really don't like getting wasted to begin with), but on a night of say 4-5 drinks, ive taken just 1 or 2 caplets and it seemed to be just fine. i mention this because i think you can probably ration your bottles depending on your night. having a tough time staying upright? you should prob take 3. just had a martini or 2 with a coworker and usually feel off the next morning? just try 1 caplet and if it doesn't work, try 2 next time.- not sure if any of the vitamins/ingredients would impact this, but i found that i also slept extremely well, even if not a lot of hours, which is sort of amazing.- expiration dates seem to be a little under a year, so don't buy too many in bulk. perhaps the effectiveness is the same and it's just an FDA guideline or something (?) but worth noting if you are religious about shelf life dates.overall, you may not need to use this very often, but its well worth the $30 to have a bottle for those times you maybe stretched your liver's tolerance and only allowed yourself 5 hours of sleep. highly recommend it.
Review Title: absolutely worth the price of admission! these things work!

Review Text: I first tried a free sample of Cheers through a Facebook ad, and was automatically enrolled in their auto ship program. I typically don’t like these practices from companies. But the free sample REALLY worked! And in between the free sample and my next delivery, we traveled to see some friends so I ordered more through Amazon to get it quicker. Let me first say that this stuff really does work. I woke up the next day with no headache, no pain in my eyes, a little tired but not hopelessly tired. I also didn’t have the “wake up at 3am from drinking too much” episode. Absolutely no nausea either. And most importantly I didn’t have the day-after-partying blues. I do want to mention that just one pill before bed worked just fine for me. My husband tried anywhere from one pill, to the suggested 3 over the course of our week long vacation and found absolutely no difference between using one, two or three pills.

I’m not a big drinker, but I definitely get killer hangovers. After a night of margarita drinking, I took these pills before going to bed. I only got a few hours of sleep and felt way better than expected. I was groggy simply from not enough sleep but these pills definitely are a miracle.

Alcohol always gave me a migraine headache the next day.  I tried a wine sulfate filter that helped although I would still wake the next day with a groggy feeling and slight headache.  But there wasn't anything for cocktails.  My daughter-in-law gave me two Thrive+ capsules at a family wedding after I had a glass of champagne and a cocktail at the reception.  It worked!  I awoke the next morning feeling great.  No headache.  No sluggishness.  No groggy feeling.  I was astounded that after all of these years I can have a drink and not suffer the next day.  It really works!

This stuff is amazing!  It makes the day after 1-2 too many cocktails/glasses of wine SO much more tolerable. It’s not going to save you if you’ve downed a bottle of jack Daniels (you’re screwed not matter what) but if you’ve had 1 too many you won’t even notice it the next day. Much more effective than the standard ibuprofen + water combination.
Review Title: Perfect solution to a couple too many glasses of wine

Review Text: Cheers is awesome for responsible drinkers. If you’ve downed a bottle of tequila on an empty stomach and don’t want to pay the consequences, then I’m sorry. This product is not for you. But if you have a bottle of wine over dinner and know you need to bring your A game the next day, ORDER CHEERS RIGHT NOW. I find after I take Cheers, I’m able to wake up on time and think clearly which is super important for pretty much anyone with a job. The all around quality is exceptional. They have a citrus tab so the flavor is refreshing and the packaging looks so nice that I can leave the jar on my nightstand. Also, you get a koozie! Not only a fun freebie but a great way to remember to take your cheers before bed! It’s evident in the packaging that this team truly believes in their product, further emphasized by the handwritten thank you card that explicitly states their guarantee. I know this doesn’t mean I can be a wino but it at least helps reduce the effects on those nights when I indulge.

So I had a total of 2 double whiskey sodas and a glass of wine.I wanted to test the product which is why I mixed a bit and asked for doubles.I NEED to know that I'll be alright even in the worst cases. Two doubles and a glass of wine isnt a lot but I know myself and I'll get a headache the next day cause of the tannins. I took three capsules right after my last drink.Not only are they hard to swallow , but they have a bad smell and taste. It's not unbearable and would be ok if the product had worked.I get ugly hangovers but this one was the worst!! I felt depressed, sweaty, disgusting and a bit suicidal, and I had the glory of puking my brains out(I DIDN'T EXPECT TO FEEL THIS BAD). I am willing to give this product another try but scared I'll be in a bed coma after. Disappointed! I'm hoping it was a one time fluke.
It kept me awake all night the times that I tried it. I am in the process of trying to get a refund.

Cheers is not the same as the old Thrive (after alcohol aid) formula!  I presumed they were the same until I ordered  them and  compared the ingredients. The ingredients are mostly the same except some of the ingredients have been reduced in dosage dramatically!  Also Cheers has a very strong lemon aroma and flavor which, to me, after drinking, is nauseating.  I’m not saying these don’t work, I’m just saying they don’t work as well as the old formula did.Furthermore,  Reading the reviews, most of the five star reviews were in 2018 while it was still Thrive.
Review Title: Not the same as old Thrive+ After Alcohol Aid!

Review Text: These are worthless. How they get such positive reviews is beyond me. I bought a bottle and split it between 4 people. None of us have noticed any real effect. If anything, I felt worse than I'd normally feel. Typical snake oil...

This is the most amazing hangover cure I have ever tried.  And believe me.. I have tried it all... it doesn't make me crave more drinking when I wake up.. it doesn't make my stomach hurt.. it doesn't make me feel dehydrated... literally has been the answers to my prayers. I'm not a huge drinker but I just always get hangovers and thought I would never ever find a cure until now... I took it on vacation with me and seriously haven't been down a single day due to a hangover. I am amazed. Thank you so much for inventing this product. I even just bought 3 more bottles.
Review Title: This is the most amazing hangover cure I have ever tried

Review Text: The FDA recalled my product for it being potentially poison. two months after the FDA ordered this recall, I got a notice in snail mail with a line and half long link I could go to for details on the recall.  The manufacturer took no responsibility nor gave any more details, nor offered to refund me for the recalled product. This company is committing fraud, even if you think their product works, which it doesn't.  If it was worth while, I would have finished the bottle before it was recalled.  This was a bad product sold by unscrupulous salesmen.

I feel like this is actually making me feel worse... I’ve always drank my traditional medicinals detox tea with some chicory root and I feel wonderful in the morning. I’ve had this two nights now and each morning I’ve woken up feeling out of it and shaky. I don’t normally give bad reviews, but it doesn’t seem to be doing well for me.

In my personal experience, this product’s main effect is to completely prevent sleep for 24hrs, increase your heart rate, and ruin your quality of life for days. I tried it twice, and on both occasions, I was quite literally wide awake and wired ALL NIGHT.My first time trying cheers, I took a couple pills before drinking and 3 before bed. It was a moderate night out of about 6 or 7 drinks. I was wide awake in bed until after sunrise, and had one of the worst hangovers I can remember the next day.My second time trying cheers, I took just 2 pills after a peaceful night drinking 2 glasses of wine at home. I was actually quite tired at the time, and convinced myself the first experience must have been caused by something else. After taking Cheers I laid wide awake in bed until 9 or 10am. During that time, finding via Amazon reviews that many others had this experience and worse, I literally made myself throw up in attempt to get this product out of my system. I wouldn’t recommend the experience.I’ve never had a sensitivity to any medication or supplement. I’ve read extensive research on DHM, and used Cheers’ competitor FlyBy for years with great results and without these side effects (they were out of stock). I don’t know what it is exactly, but it seems to me that Cheers is recklessly formulated and may contain a stimulant that is not advertised. Avoid it at all costs.
Review Title: If you want to quit sleeping and be unwell for a whole weekend, you’ll love this product.

Review Text: I took Thrive+ after a heavy day of Mardi Gras day-drinking and I felt perfectly fine the next morning. I haven't drunk like that, EVER, and I should have been suffering from the worst hangover of my life, but instead, I felt good enough to go to brunch and drink some more! Great product and definitely worth the money!
Review Title: No hangover after worst night of drinking

Review Text: Unfortunately this product does not help with the negative effects from drinking AT ALL. I do not get typical hangovers (no headaches, vomiting, or nausea) I just usually feel very groggy and not clear headed the day after drinking. I tried Thrive or Cheers (whatever it's called now) three different times. The first time I took 3 pills immediately after my last drink. The next time I tried 4. And the next time 5 pills. Each time not only did I still feel groggy, sluggish, and not clear headed after drinking, but I also had a HORRIBLE headache and nausea which I never usually get.

I purchased this for a group of us 30 somethings that wanted to party like we were 21 again. We went out, drank pretty heavily and, before we headed home, popped three or 4 of these each. Most of us still woke up with hangovers. When i wrote Cheers about the problem they said "next time take the pill immediately after your last drink." I'm WAAAAY too busy being drunk to KNOW that my last drink is FOR SURE my last drink. Disappointment. 4/10 no bueno.

It works my liver thanks you guys. Little expensive for small amount. I saw you guys on shark tank. You were not treated fairly and those idiots lost a good deal. Keep your faith up believe all is possible.
Review Title: You were not treated fairly and those idiots lost a good deal. Keep your faith up believe all is ...

Review Text: This stuff is wonderfully enabling. Takes away the harsh bite of the hangover.What it doesn’t do though is kick the withdrawal symptoms, which if you’re a regular drinker you know can sometimes be worse than the hangover. (shakes, arrhythmia, anxiety, cravings etc)I’ve bought at least 5 jars of these and am a regular drinker - after taking the pills frequently (not every night but on nights I drank extra heavy (3 times a week) )  I have stopped taking them because of the adverse side effects I’ve experienced.Difficulty swallowing is the worst. The following day after taking the pills swallowing food was painful. Any other swallowing was difficult as if something was stuck in my throat. This side effect subsided but lasted for at least a week.Another terrifying side effect is short term memory loss. Now, before you try and say ‘wElL yOuRe a DrInKeR tHaT cOMeS wItH tHe tErRiToRy” I’ll tell you - as a regular drinker (for a few years)  - my short term memory loss has not been so damaged as it as been by taking these pills. It is nothing short of terrifying.  The short term memory loss alone has stopped me from taking these - I have a full jar on my night stand -I will not be swallowing any more of these pills - ever.My best advice? - DO NOT TAKE MORE THAN ONE DOSE IN A WEEK.It will buffer your hangover if you’re a weekend drinker but don’t make it a habit of relying on these pills.
Review Title: Side effects are worse than hang over

Review Text: If you've ever spent any length of time in Japan and you are a drinker, you have probably are familiar with the little 2 oz. shots of Ukon no Chikara (a tasty little Tumeric drink), that if taken right after the last drink, will absolutely prevent any hangover symptoms.  Ukon would be my choice of product, buying it as an import is quite pricey, so I was definitely up to trying something different.  I ordered the $0 trial from the website first and liked the product enough to add it to my subscribe and save auto-delivery here at Amazon.  You can also get it auto-delivered from the website, but I like that control I have over the shipment schedule through Amazon.  I don't typically drink enough to get sloshed, but I do have 2 glasses of red wine every night (maybe up to 4 on a Friday night.)  My main reason for trying the product is not so much to avoid the after-effects that next morning, but more for liver protection.  After your last drink and before bed, you swallow 3 capsules with a glass of water.  The capsules are quite large (which would be my only negative) and have a hint of mint flavor, which I like.  As I said, my reasons for trying were really more about my liver health, rather than avoiding a hangover, but I do feel better in the morning.  I feel energized and hydrated.

They make it hard to cancel once you subscribe, so I advise against it. Oh, and not to mention its doesn't even do anything you will notice. And their science is dubious and their controlled experiment is a total joke. Go and look up the details and you will laugh. They asked like 7 ppl if they felt better. Only thing of value is the milk thistle but you can buy that for a tiny fraction of this cost.  You are paying for branding and flashy advertisign and website which they actively design to work against you when you finally want to end the scam.
Review Title: This product doesn't do anything and they are scammers

Review Text: As a pharmacist, I was skeptical from the beginning. I was encouraged because NAC was in the ingredients list, but disappointed because the dosage is only 50 mg in three capsules. I drank 4 martinis specifically for the purpose of testing this product. I took three capsules before bed as directed. In the morning I woke up with the same hangover as usual. This product made absolutely no difference whatsoever. You can file this product under “snake oil”.

I'm at the age where if I even walk past a bar, I have a hangover the next day - but I still like to enjoy a good drink from time to time. It's a conundrum. I'm pretty skeptical about things that claim to cure hangovers, but considering some of the humdingers I've had over the years, I'm willing to try most anything. Prior to trying Cheers Hangover Cure, I would have said they're all snake oil or some other kind of con. But I may have to change my tune. Since buying this product, there have been 5-6 separate occasions where I've had enough to drink that I should have felt like death-warmed-over the next day. But I took Cheers Hangover Cure before going to bed, and I felt fine the next morning - each and every time. Once or twice I would have said was a fluke or something. But 5-6 times defies the laws of coincidence as far as I'm concerned. I think this stuff really works. If there's drinking involved, I plan to never be without it again.
Review Title: Another drink? Don't mind if I do.

Review Text: Starting in my late twenties, red wine would make me restless and wake many times during sleep. It progressively got worse, starting to happen with other alcoholic beverages. It didn’t matter if it was 1 or 4 drinks, vodka, beer or wine, if I was stressed or not stressed at all. I’d wake up shortly after falling asleep and suffer the whole night with anxious feelings, an inability to fall back asleep and would therefore suffer the next day due to the extremely poor sleep I had gotten. The simple solution would be don’t ever drink, right? Wrong. I love a nice glass of wine with dinner with girlfriends or want to be able to toast with champagne, grab a beer at a game, etc. I enjoy it! I was pleasantly surprised to find that Cheers was the answer! I take 3 before bed and sleep well at night. I feel good in the morning and can enjoy my light to moderate social drinking without suffering the poor sleep! Thank you Cheers. I finished one bottle then ordered 3 more so I can share with friends. Everyone who enjoys an alcoholic beverage or three :) should have this in their cupboard to keep on hand.
Review Title: Be able to sleep well after wine without insomnia!

Review Text: I’m a regular drinker and I only take these if I’ve gotten drunk and I have to get up early for work the next day. They do help, but they are by no means a miracle cure. I don’t really get bad hangovers, but they help with the brain fog and “hangxiety” by about 30-40%.I think they are pretty overpriced at roughly $35 for 12 doses. Also, they have obscenely wasteful packaging. They come in a larger than necessary box with a beer cozy and a pamphlet every single time. All that stuff goes in the trash. Maybe skip the beer cozy that no one wants and lower the price a tad.
Review Title: Works somewhat, but overpriced and wasteful packaging

Review Text: Really wanted this to work, but it didn't.  I can't drink more than one beer (no not gluten intolerant)  All alocohol will give me a hangover, but beer is the worst and most predictable.  So the other night I went to test this out.  I had a whopping 3 beers,  taking the product per direction (2 pills after a drink) and a pint of water after each drink.  Guess what 3 am woke up with a hangover.  I will put this in the category of a Fail.

I’ve been a moderate drinker for many years, and I recently cut back to drinking less frequently, so, I’ve only used this product twice so far.In the past, I purchased two other Cheers products (Protect and Hydrate).  The “Restore” product never really seemed cost-effective for me when I was drinking more frequently, since one bottle only contain 10 doses.  I wish there were more doses for the price of the product.As for how it works: It did seem to help minimize the negative effects of alcohol, but it wasn’t as noticeable as I expected.  I did feel slightly better during the night and the next morning, so it definitely did something.  I think I need to try it after having more than 2 drinks.  Maybe then I’d notice a bigger impact.P.S.  Amazon asked me to rate the “thickness” of this product- no idea what that means in relation to Cheers Restore After Alcohol Aid.
Review Title: Seems to “work”, but I wish for more doses per bottle!

Review Text: I get the worst hangovers and I get them very easily. Sometimes, I'll have 2-3 IPAs and feel terrible the entire next day (while hardly being buzzed the night before). It's been so frustrating, that I had stopped wanting to drink at all. So I've been actively searching for anything that could help just a little bit. I first tried cheers about a year ago.  I was extremely skeptical, as I have tried other hangover remedies with no success. But Cheers has been a lifesaver for me.  I feel 100X better than I used to feel when I wake up after drinking. Even after big celebrations, like weddings, I feel great the next day and can even eat and drink mimosas in the morning-- which is worlds different from laying the fetal position with saltines and gatorade.  I bought a bottle for each of my groomsman for my upcoming wedding. For just a few dollars per outing, this is very much worth it. I've even passed this on to friends and family who agree that it works wonders for them as well. I'm not sure if it works for everyone- but if you're in the same boat as me and get hangovers easily from limited alcohol consumption, I would definitely give it a shot! Thank you Cheers!

This is our second order.  Personally, I like the powder best but it's hard to come home and then chug a full thing of water when you're obviously using this product because you have probably had one too many.....That being said, I feel it does work, especially for my husband who is no stranger to punishing his liver on a regular basis....  The bottles seemed smaller, the packaging was nice, but really not necessary to be that fancy.  I would rather have a cheaper price & some bubble wrap vs. the box.  Worth a shot, give it a try!

I am going to be 34 soon and decided to give this a try since my hangovers nowadays make me feel like death on earth!  Yes I know the solution is "just don't drink", but come on people, that is easier said than done!  I used this product several times to get a feel for how well it works.  I don't feel like it 100% makes you feel like you didn't drink (I was still thirsty in the morning, still felt like I could eat the world the next morning and unfortunately still made too many trips to the bathroom the next day) BUT it does significantly help with tiredness and the other crappy hangover effects that make it super hard to function the next day.  After taking these pills before bed, I was actually functioning the next day at the normal level I do when I am not hungover (except being more thirsty, hungry and poopy the next day).  I highly recommend this if you want to minimize the effects of the dreaded hangover.

The protective lid on the jar looked breached when I removed the lid. At first, I didn’t think too much into it since the adhesive on these lids sometimes peel up, but then I thought I’d count the amount of pills in the jar. I counted 31, in a jar that’s clearly marked 36. I haven’t tried the product yet (debating if I even should now), so I can’t give a fair product review in regards to effectiveness, but this is pretty ridiculous considering the rest of the clean packaging and already high price tag in my opinion.
Review Title: Protective lid not sealed. Pills missing!

Review Text: Not a fan of this product at all. I used it on 4 different occasions and each time I woke up with an awful headache the next morning. I took 3-4 capsules before bed and drank a bottle of water each time. I don’t recommend this product at all wish I could return it for my money back. I’m better off with just taking a couple Advil before bed.

I was encouraged by the Shark Tank tag, but it turned out to be a hoax product in the end.  My friend tried it before I did, and it turned her normal one-day hangover into a three-day hangover.  I thought maybe she was just really hungover, or coincidentally sick those days, but I tried it as well.  Made me feverish, had horrible digestion issues, couldn't sleep, felt horrible for two days.  If I'd had more to drink than I did and not taken these dumb pills, I'd have felt better than I did after taking them.  Don't waste your money!
Review Title: DON'T BE FOOLED! IT DOESN'T WORK!!

Review Text: When I started taking this product, it caused a lot of cystic acne up on my chin. As I didn't link the product to the problem I continued taking them because they do work for hangovers.... that's why I gave them two stars.  But what I didn't know when I read the ingredients for typical acne culprits is that in some people (probably those prone to acne breakouts I would guess) too much Vitamin B12 can cause acne.  I have a tendency towards hormonal acne which appear usually when I slip up with my diet with milk and soy. When I started taking these I had also gone out to eat and just figured that I must have eaten something incorrectly or something had gotten past my radar. After a week of purging both on my chin and purging my kitchen of anything new I started digging into information online.  Hope this helps anyone else going through the same issue.

After I turned 30 I started getting hangovers. As I got older, they got worse to the point where even when, after a night of drinking where I wasn't drunk, I'd get terrible sleep and wake up with a headache. That's just unfair right? You shouldn't have to be hung over after actually practicing moderation!I'm a science-minded individual, and therefore a skeptic. So when I heard about these new hangover preventions I was extremely skeptical, even though they have sciency-sounding reasoning behind them. So do essential oils and accupuncture and all sorts of woo medicine treatments right?But, I don't believe hangover prevention is permanently out of reach, and I realized that when someone did figure it out they'd have those same sciency-sounding marketing materials. And it was cheap enough that I figured if it didn't work (which I thought was almost certain) well, it was just the cost of a couple drinks lost. No big deal.So imagine my surprise the first night I imbibed too much, took Thrive, and woke up feeling normal. I "experimented" (a.k.a. got drunk) a few more times, and the same thing. I gave it to friends for peer review, and they replicated my experiments with the same results.This stuff actually works. It does. It's not a miracle cure. If you drink enough, you're still going to feel it. But you'll feel it a lot less. If someone asked you if you'd pay a few bucks to turn that bad hangover into a mild one, or a regular one into nothing, you'd say yes in a heartbeat right? That's basically these pills. For what works out to about the price of a couple cups of coffee, these pills save you hours of pain and suffering. That's a great deal.
Review Title: I'm as surprised as I was skeptical, but this stuff works.

Review Text: Last night I was mixing different kinds of alcohol and had somewhere to be today so I figured it was the perfect time to try these out. When I woke up I felt like I had had too much caffeine. Shakes, pounding heart, couldn’t sit still and cold sweats. Things did not improve from there. A few hours later I was VIOLENTLY ill, vomiting & going to the bathroom and the scary part was I was drinking tons of water for the dry mouth I also had and couldn’t pee. About 13/14 hours after I had taken the pills (I took 3 as directed on bottle) things slowly started improving but I still feel funky and my heart keeps racing every now and then even though I’m just sitting on my couch. Needless to say I didn’t make it to where I wanted to go today, and spent the day wondering if I’d end up in ER.

I have been using Cheers for over a year now, and I feel like I don't want to drink without it. I'm in college, so needless to say, my friends and I can get pretty wild sometimes. But no matter how much I drink, if I take three pills, I feel oddly fine the next morning. There still may be some very slight brain fog or like the echo of a headache, but I'm never anxious, I've never had a terrible headache, or been in a bad mood the next day after drinking. I need to keep these to myself since my friends like it, too. The only feedback I have to give Cheers is to find a way to make the product cheaper-- it could help a lot of people! But it's still worth it 110%, and I'll be a customer for life.
Review Title: What is this black magic?? IT WORKS!

Review Text: I'll be honest. I thought this was a scam. I came for these after seeing Facebook comments saying they work.They really, really do.If you're a professional drunk like me, you know that B12 can work wonders for hangovers. I figured these were just fancy branded B12 pills. They are absolutely not. While they do contain a lot if B12, they also contain a lot more of other things, including a super secret special Japanese magic natural ingredient from the heavens. I don't know what it is, but it works.Directions says to take 3 before passing the hell out after boozing. I've only taken 2, and let me tell you, it is a world of difference. No artillery headache, no seasick queasiness. The next morning, all I felt was worn out from a night if debauchery. You'll still feel sluggish, but you will not be sick.I've always believed in the hangover trifecta: B12, pedialyte, greasy food. Even still, after a night of serious boozing, I needed a 12 hour recovery period. Cheers has totally supplanted the trifecta and caused an alcoholic power struggle in my liver. I can drink more, better, and not beg for death the next day.I'm just as surprised as you are. There really is a hangover cure. God bless America.
Review Title: Believe the rumors-- this stuff really honestly does work

Review Text: I hate to write this because initially, I loved this product.  I recommended it to many friends and family, however, I am in hospital right now. I came in for abdominal pain, bloating,urine brown. I thought possible bladder infection. After tests My liver enzymes levels were through the roof . One of my levels was 1672 normal range is 30. I’ve been here 3 day numerous test all healthy, liver had no physical signs of damage through ultrasound and ct. Drs were stumped.  All my tests scans urinalysis, all healthy . Finally I gave dr information on cheers restore.. They looked it over and have decided this has caused my issues . I am a healthy individual. It doesn’t happen to everyone but be aware it can.

A good friend was having a party with a basically open bar to celebrate her birthday. To test these out five of us, women ranging from 28-50 all took these at the end of the night (we all took 3 each). Four of the five of us had no hang over to speak of, and the last one had a headache that went away with some ibprofen. We mixed alcohols and by normal standards we all should have been feeling it the next day. Def recommend this product! And by the way we did give the product to two men that night as well, but both forgot to take them lol.
Review Title: Did the trick, no hangover in sight!

Review Text: I really wanted this product to work.  I bought it for my birthday as I knew I would be drinking a few beers.  I followed the directions and dosage.  Woke up the next morning sick.  Was nauseous and threw up twice ! Never had that happen before with the amount of beer I had.  Was just really hoping that when I took it, it would cut back on a headache. Not make me sick.  So.... long story short it isn’t for me.  Hopefully it works better for everyone else.  Love the packaging though. Really wanted it to work.11.12.2020- updated my review- as I contacted them for a refund and found it was super easy to get a refund.  As well as they have amazing customer service.  I hope this product works for other-- I really do.

I’ve noticed recently when I drink, I was getting that anxiety the next day and I was never like that in the past. Maybe it’s an age thing? Anyhow, I saw this product on instragram and figured I’d give it a try. The last two times I’ve drank I’ve taken 3 pills after my last drink and I will say I didn’t notice the anxiety the next day. Stomach bothered me the first time but I think that was the tequila and late night bacon. The second I used the pills, I was completely fine the next day. I was up early, worked out, etc. A little dehydrated but fine. They seem to work for me, I know everyone is different, but it can’t hurt to give them a try.

Don't let the two star review fool you: these pills work. To me, they smell refreshingly like peppermint and definitely deter a hangover when taken the night before.They lose three stars for three reasons. They have substantially decreased the number of pills per bottle since they were Thrive (and bought by a shark tank investor), they have dramatically increased the price, and they have basically become eco terrorists with their packaging. Flashy packaging is great for initially selling a product, but repeat customers (the majority of your market) do not need the ridiculous marketing glossy with.every.order and most of us do NOT want a cup cozy (seriously?)I hope they consider other options. I certainly am.

Tried this three times. Once -there was no curing that hangover (2 pills). Second time I didn't drink too much, and took one pill and it was OK. Third time I had just the right number of drinks that I thought, three will do the trick (recommended dosage). The next morning I had amazing dreams and woke up with an overwhelming sense of happiness and well being. It seemed to be a mood enhancer. I think that was due to the milk thistle. It really effected me, the last thing on my mind was a hangover. However, milk thistle can have side effects and unfortunately the next next morning I had terrible gastrointestinal issues coupled with a nightmare psychosomatic deja vu fog. (I did not drink the next day.) Diarrhea and nausea, no vomiting or headache. It was like the milk thistle was treating me to a second term of mood alteration via my colon, but in the nightmare direction. That lasted about 2.5 hours and then I had to sleep through the morning until noon. When I woke up I was tired but fine. I don't think milk thistle agrees with me.

I was skeptical going in.  But for those nights that get a little out of hand, Cheers really comes in handy.  Does it completely eliminate any semblance of a hangover?  No.  But does it make you more functional?  Yes.  We joke that it takes you from an F to about a B-.  It's not a get-out-of-jail-free solution, but it's something.  Unfortunately, it appears to work for some and not others -- friends have tried it and reported no change, others have seen it erase their hangover entirely.  But to be clear - this has been reserved for those really bad nights.  Those weddings, those New Years parties, those Bachelor/ette parties, where it really will have the biggest impact.  One downfall - you have to take 3 pills per dose, and you have to take them before you go to bed.  Both can be challenging in those...challenging situations.  But I would recommend giving the product a shot, because even if it provides some benefit, it's certainly worth it.
Review Title: It works for me...but temper expectations

Review Text: I bought this several times when it was called Thrive+ and it worked well when I was drinking regularly (2-3 times a week) and wanted to avoid hangover symptoms. (I also tried other hangover cures then that did not work nearly as well.) Then I stopped drinking completely for a while to get healthy and lose some weight. Once I got that in check, I wanted to be able to have a couple drinks with friends every once in a while but the next day I'd be so depressed and anxious, it just wasn't worth the fun. This product fixes that, too. Now I can go out, have a couple drinks and take this before bed and wake up feeling fine, no extreme moods to deal with and very little other after effects from the booze (you'll still be a bit off, but so minor, it's pretty amazing). I'm a big believer in the science behind this, now having tested it on myself in two different types of drinking scenarios. I'm glad to be able to drink socially and not worry about the next day being super emotional (or queasy). And they send a cute beer coozie with your order. I have so many now, people think I work for this company. :-) Cheers!
Review Title: It really does address both physical and mental effects of drinking

Review Text: This product requires not only taking three pills but the purchase of another product. The other product is a mixture to prepare at the time you want to take the pills.  If someone has had a few drinks, whose crazy idea as it to require the dexterity of preparing the hangover cure for only 50% relief the net morning.  I woke up not cured but still tipsy. Try a different t brand.  Just because this stares “as seen in Shark Tank” doesn’t mean anyone financed it. Don’t be fooled like me. Keep looking. Getting my money back!

This is my second time buying cheers.  I find that as I get older I dont bounce back the morning after having drinks as well as I used to.  Thats where cheers comes in. I find that if I take it before I go to bed, or after my last drink of the evening - I do not feel hungover and foggy the next day. It worked so well the first time I purchased it that I have purchased it again.  Its a bonus knowing its also good for my liver which probably needs the added boost after having a few drinks.  Also if you tried cheers earlier on you probably remember that there was a lemongrass scented pack inside. It has been changed to a minty smell/flavor which I am guessing is a more universally accepted flavor. I like it but if you dont you can remove the scented atomizer.
Review Title: Take Cheers and beat the hangover

Review Text: This did not work for me at all.  I don't drink very much but tend to get easily dehydrated and hoped that maybe this would help.  I tried it 3x with about 3 drinks over the course of an evening and I couldn't tell any difference in it improving the after effects.

Wow, I do not drink very much, so when I do socially, it’s usually a big night out for my husband and I (meaning that we drink quite heavily on that one night per month). Usually I have a two day hangover and am just miserable. It’s usually hard for me to sleep as alcohol really disrupts my sleep cycle. The package says, “Feel 50% better or your money back.” Honestly, I slept a full 8 hours and I felt 90% the next day. It seems pricey, but for those of us who use it infrequently, it’s a great deal (one pack will last me a year). I am just so impressed by this! Cheers!

I usually get bad hangovers, but as a person in my late twenties that doesn't stop me from drinking a lot. These pills are not complete magic, but they seriously work. I have little to no effects after a night of moderate drinking and a manageable headache after heavy drinking. I used these this weekend. On Sat night, I drank one beer, 2 glasses of wine, and 2 gin cocktails then took these pills (3) before bed. I woke up at 6:30 am feeling fine and went to a spin class. That normally would've resulted in an awful headache and skipping of morning spin class while I ate a bacon, egg, and cheese on the couch. I then had a Sunday wedding where it was so hot out that I drank rosé like water. Must've had around 6 glasses of rosé, and a glass or two ea of champagne and prosecco. I'm writing this at work, tired with a slight headache but functioning. These pills are so worth the cost!

I was informed about Cheers (after alcohol aid) by a surgical assistant. She told me how great it worked. I was skeptical because I get THE WORST hangovers even if I only drink a couple alcoholic drinks. I had given up alcohol for 3 years because of that, and I missed the little buzz of happiness. I tried Cheers. I took the capsules right after my last drink of the evening. When I woke up the next day, I felt GREAT! Not one sign of a hangover! No headache (sometimes a migraine, was gone) no stomach ache or nausea, no shakiness, no brain fog!!! I have kept it stocked since then. I have ordered many more times! I have bought Cheers for presents; have given it out at parties! Every single person that has taken it has LOVED it! Now, I get invited to ALL the parties! This is a medical breakthrough if ever there was one!! A big “Cheers” to Cheers!
Review Title: USED TO get the worst hangovers, not any more!

Review Text: I used to love this product... I have bought about 6 bottles of it. They have changed the packaging and something else. It used to say take 1 to 3 capsules. Now it just says 3. The potency has changed so you have to buy more of it. It used to be taste free. My last bottle tasted like citrus and this new one is mint. They should have stuck to the original that actually worked.I used to speak so highly about this product to everyone. Now I’m a bit embarrassed. I’m not sure what changed but the price seems to keep increasing and the effects are decreasing. Every bottle I’ve ordered has been different. Which is a bit concerning. Now you only have to spend $90 for a full hangover cure and the added product line. Rather than $30 for what used to actually work. I will no longer tell people to buy this product.
Review Title: It used to work! But they changed it.

Review Text: I've tried the cheaper pills, which just reinforced how well these work. Drinking in your 30s is rough, and I wanted to make sure I was protecting my liver if I could. I went wine for wine with a friend and took these after - woke up feeling normal - she reported feeling awful! That sold her on getting them too. My only complaint is that it comes like a "new member" kit every time you order, and I do not need that many coozies.I typically take them 1:1 on how many drinks I've had, up to 3. After three I just take the three, but it still seems to work as well!

I was a huge fan of this product back when it was called "Thrive." I told everyone I knew to buy it because as a 22 yr old who gets bad hangovers every time I drink, Thrive enabled me to wake up functional and not wanting to die. It was amazing. But when they changed to "Cheers" they also changed the formula and now it does not perform nearly as well as before. Pretty sad about it. Going to try something else to compare.

This product did have a positive effect when I drank. But did not completely make the effects of alcohol dissapear. The effects of the supplement seems inconsistent at times, but it's probably due to physiology. It could also be that alcoholic drinks can differ chemically from one another and change the effectiveness of the product. This supplement works really well for me when I drink beer, but definitely doesn't work as well when I drink champagne. It seems to be the sulfates a in the champagne that alters the effectiveness of the supplement. My body just hates champagne.
Review Title: This works to some extent, but is not a magic pill at least for me.

Review Text: It really is a day and night difference! I usually get debilitating hangovers, but with cheers, I get a slight "off" feeling the next day and that's it! No more spins, no more puking, no more pounding headache! I will say my hangovers went from an 8/10 to a 2 or 1/10. I can't confirm this next part, but my friend took cheers because she began to feel sick from drinking, and said that it helped even the same night not to throw up or anything. Also, she did not have a hangover the next day.I even got my brother and my fiance hooked! My bridesmaids for my upcoming wedding will each be receiving a bottle of their own.They are pricey, but worth every penny if you are like me and get terrible hangovers.
Review Title: EVERYONE WHO DRINKS SHOULD BUY CHEERS

Review Text: Purchased these after seeing someone on instagram say they hadn't had a hangover in an year due to these. They have been life changing. My husband and I both don't feel like we can drink without them now. You take 3 and a glass of water before bed after drinking. We have felt soooo much better than when we don't take them. We may still feel a little "sluggish" or "foggy" but the splitting headaches and nausea are non-existent. Wish they were slight cheaper, but will keep purchasing for sure. Some friends we've told have been skeptical and said "well its just B12 and Milk Thistle and some other vitamins" but the fact that it's all neatly packaged together and I don't have to buy multiple different things and combine doses and have the ease of just popping 3 of these little guys is worth it to me! Recommend!!!

My husband and I like to partake in a good amount of drinks every now and then when we're with our friends. I am completely out of pocket for a full 24 hours after. I tell him I'm on PTO from taking care of our toddler. I took these before bed after we had been out drinking from 2pm until 12am with friends (acting like 25 year olds with no responsibilities) and woke up feeling just about completely fine. I was tired still, but my entire body didn't hurt like it normally does after drinking. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
Review Title: If you ever drink and have kids- GET THIS

Review Text: The product doesnt get rid of the hangover all the time,for instance if you have 2-3 different beers then switch to vodka & then to Scotch you will have a hangover, just not as severe as if you didn't take Thrive. You also have to know how many to take after drinking so much alcohol.  Itl take some suffering & learning the dosage your body will need. My 3rd time has been the best. I just adjust how many capsules i need to take after consuming different amounts of booze. Ill get it right, might take one whole bottle but the reward is better than the hangover.
Review Title: Take right after you stop your consumption of alcohol

Review Text: I have been a drinker for a LONG time. In fact, I am trying to reduce my drinking at the current time. I deal with the "hangxiety", and other short-term alcohol withdrawal symptoms. Those of you who are familiar with these know that the best way to get rid of them has always been to have a drink! For someone who is trying to drastically reduce their alcohol intake this is NOT a good thing. Cheers takes that away, and makes it easier to say no to the all-to-early next day drink! This can really help with those who are trying to quit drinking. I would recommend this product wholeheartedly to those who are in this same position! I have already ordered another bottle! Thanks, Cheers!
Review Title: Substantial Supplement for those of us who like to drink!

Review Text: I am a fan of all things Shark Tank and willing to try new products.  These pills did not work for me, they made we feel worse.  I am not sure what ingredent didnt agree with me but I felt worse after taking the pills.  Everyone is differnet so these may work for you but i threw them out.

These pills make it too easy to have a little too much.  Like others have said - this isn't gonna prevent you from feeling off if you slug a full bottle of vodka, but if you're like me and occasionally open the second bottle of wine and realize your dog hasn't drank any and you've been alone all night... then this will save you from you from morning regrets.  Take three before bed, and I wake up feeling chipper and ready to go - honestly better than I feel on normal days when I don't need hangover pills.  I am debating taking nightly, even when I don't drink.  Will report back if I become a C.E.O.

I picked up these because I was about to celebrate my 40th bday... and I can’t do hangovers anymore. For me a hangover lasts about a week nowadays. So on my 40th celebration, I went out and drank quite a bit. Stupid me, I mixed drinks (shots, beer, liquor, mixed drinks/jack and coke). After I stopped drinking I popped 3 of these bad boys and went to sleep still drunk. Woke up.... NO HANGOVER. Holy cow! How is this possible?!? And why didn’t this exist in my 20’s and 30’s?!? I woke up feeling about 90-95%. I could tell that I had a lot to drink but still had energy, no headache, no body ache, no dizziness, no vomiting. None of that. A slight amount (very very little) of sluggishness is all I felt. These pills are fantastic!
Review Title: Holy moly... this stuff ACTUALLY works!!

Review Text: Update - my original review was for Thrive. I ordered a couple bottles and it worked. I got a bottle of the new Cheers...it does not work. I woke up more hungover after a couple drinks than I have in a long time. Thrive was a miracle, Cheers is a waste.Let me start off by saying this IS NOT a miracle in a bottle, but close. I purchased this after a recommendation from a friend.  He partied a little too hard before a work day.  He took this and got a couple hours of sleep and was good to go for work!  I took this with me for a 3 night drinking extravaganza with friends.  We had several hours of drinking each night and took 3 pills prior to going to bed.  We woke up feeling a little tired but most of the hangover symptoms you experience from a nigh like this were not present.  The third and final night we went ham.  Thrive kept us alive the next day but i think at that point nothing was going to save us.  It did allow us to make the drive back without feeling like death.
Review Title: New Cheers does not work. Old Thrive was a miracle.

Review Text: We all know how age gets us - slows us down as a part of the natural progression of life. We tend to not go out as much for the pure simple fact that it takes roughly 2-3 days to recover from a really fun night of dancing with our loved ones and doing those shots to keep us going through the night! WELL! PRAISE BE!! Thrive is the answer to those pesky hangovers, hands down! I've just purchased my 3rd bottle and no, not because I drink every night LOL!! I find myself telling everyone about it and giving them a few to try out, only to find out that I AM NOT ALONE! Everyone who tries it sends me a text the next day saying THANK YOU! So, THANK YOU Thrive for giving me the opportunity to hang out, drink and dance without having to worry about waking up vomiting and shaking with a headache that could legit make my eyes explode! PSA: Drink water throughout the night if you REALLY want to wake up like last night never happened - Adding Thrive to your water intake is really the most amazing pairing that has EVER happened!
Review Title: This stuff is sent from the Gods!

Review Text: I’m a very small adult who frequently feels sick after taking adult size vitamins. So I should’ve known better than to take 3 capsules of anything. I took 3 after having 4-5 drinks over several hours, and I woke up with diarrhea and feeling like I needed to vomit. I felt this way all night but was better the next day. If I take again at all, it will be one capsule, not 3.

I like to drink but I hate being hungover. Being in my 30’s, it’s a hangover week vs a few hours like it used to be. Or I feel gross if I just look at a cheap wine. So these are amazing. Yes, they are expensive. But they work! And I know last time I was hungover I was willing to sell just about anything if I meant I could feel better. Don’t get me wrong, after drinking and taking these you don’t feel like you could run a marathon. But you feel noticeably better, like a big glass of water, a hot shower and a few Tylenol and you’ll be good as new. I’m buying these for my up coming bachelorette party weekend so we can have fun without so much worry!

Being someone who gets brutal hangovers pretty frequently, I was amazed with Cheers. My GF has helped me out a ton by simply reminding me to drink a ton of water both before and when I drink (which also definitely helps).I really wanted to test out how well Cheers would work on it's own though.. so this past weekend I intentionally drank a ton (for research-purposes only, of course), didn't really drink any water throughout the night, and took 3 pills right before bed. Woke up in the morning and didn't feel terrible at all!!! There was def still a lingering "mild-ish" hangover, but nothing like what I'd normally deal with. Only ~$3 to avoid losing my entire Sunday to hangovers? Easiest $$ I've ever spent

I've done a lot of research on supplements to aid in the recovery of alcohol consumption. Cheers is a great fix that works. I was skeptical at first but have found myself using this product after a few drinks to ensure I'm more clear the next day. I'm sure this product affects individuals different based on diet, hydration, body type, etc. etc. but I would say it's worth a try.I found value when the product is running a sale or Amazon promotion. I've recently purchased the kit combo kit that includes the Restore, Hydrate, and Protect. I'm waiting to see how that combo works for me. In full transparency, I would call this or any other product a "cure" but there is no doubt that it helps lessen the negative effects of drinking.Cheers!P.S. Not sure why one of the Rating Features asked to rate this product for "thickness" lol
Review Title: Quality ingredients known to work and peace of mind after drinking

Review Text: I absolutely love this product. I have tried another company previously but it was out of stock so I figured I would try Cheers for a family vacation that was going to involve massive amounts of drinking. I bought enough for all of us to try it three times and every morning all of us were completely shocked at how “okay” we were. Now none of us blacked out so I can’t speak to that type of hangover but I can say we all got bombed and we’re up, moving, eating, and ready to start the day by 8-9am which is typically when we would roll out of bed praying for sweet relief or death. Not only will I be buying Cheers again but my three family members who tried it with me will be too. You’re not 100% but it’s definitely as advertised and you’re more than 50% better. Side note drunkenly eating ramen noodles gets you almost 100%. Also, the pills are on the larger end which didn’t bother us but could for some (comparable to the other brand I’ve tried though). But the packaging was so cool and it came with a koozie!! They’re also more reasonably priced based on other options on Amazon. So yeah to sum it all up whether you’ve tried other hangover pills or are looking for your first one definitely try Cheers you won’t regret it.
Review Title: Drunken vacation tested and it truly works!!

Review Text: These work well as long as you don't get blackout wrecked. And they won't completely get rid of your hangover but there is a noticeable decrease in headache severity if you take these compared to taking nothing or Advil only. Make sure to take at least three capsules along with two Advil before going to bed (taking them in the morning doesn't work) and you'll be ready for those bottomless mimosas at brunch the next day. The main knock on these and why I gave four stars instead of five is that they're expensive and don't last long when you drink as much as I do. A little reduction in price would go a long way. Happy boozing! Also, for the love of God, don't drink and drive.
Review Title: Not miracle pills but dang close

Review Text: The original product called Thrive worked quite well.  I ordered the new “Cheers” and noticed it had a distinct citrus odor.  Looking at the label, the active ingredients changed drastically. Why mess with something that worked?
Review Title: Scientifically Proven...  Then why change the formula?

Review Text: It all boils down to dihydromyricetin (DHM), a liver detox and hangover prevention ingredient. Most hangover cures are a bit vague as to the amount of DHM they possess. The average product carries 300 mg. Hang Zero, one of the better brands, has 400 mg per serving.... Cheers has 1200 mg, which is the highest on the market!As a seasoned drinker, I've tried many hangover cures and Cheers is by far the most effective. (The worst are those awful drinks, a la DRINKADE, which taste so bad, you'd almost rather just suffer through the hangover!!) For me, Cheers is key to enormously reducing nausea, the sweats, and the runs.I will say, Cheers is much more effective, the smarter you are about hydrating throughout your evening. It's not going to feel like the miracle it *can* be, if you go completely nuts and drink half a bottle of tequila on an empty stomach with no dinner or water, as I did on my birthday. But if you're smarter about your use of Cheers, and add some food/water to your evening drinks, I guarantee you will feel a million times better in the morning. It's a game changer. Absolutely. I will be buying this product for years to come.So, cheers to Cheers, and cheers to research and Neuroscience!
Review Title: Highest Levels of dihydromyricetin (DHM) on the market.... Need I say more?

Review Text: I love wine but the older I get, the less it loves me. I've already reduced my drinking and think of myself as very moderate but I can definitely feel it the next day even if I just have a couple of glasses of my favorite red. Until I found Cheers. It makes a difference. I didn't want to believe it and I've experimented with taking and it and not but I keep coming back and buying more. For me it's the difference between feeling heavy, headachy and tired or feeling NORMAL. I'm not ready to stop drinking wine. Cheers allows me to enjoy a glass or two and feel actually good the next day. Grateful.

I bought these ahead of a birthday weekend when I knew I would be drinking heavily multiple days in a row. I took them each night after drinking for 3 nights in a row and they were complete life savers. I had energy and avoided my typical hang-xiety, making the mornings a lot more enjoyable. Don't get me wrong, 100% of symptoms won't be gone, but this was a huge improvement that positively impacted the quality of my trip.

Like many reviewers say - it works. However you def still feel like you drank. It doesn’t completely wash away your debauched sins, only the (wo)man above can do that. I took this after a big night and woke up the next morning tired but not feeling like I was dying, which is how I usually feel after those types of nights. Packaging, however, is very wasteful. It comes with unneeded extras like a coozy. Also, they fill the heavy bottle only 2/3 of the way full. With today’s environmental concerns it’s a bad look. Reduce unnecessary waste. That’s why they get 4 stars.
Review Title: It works fam, but the packaging is too much

Review Text: Purchased these doubtful that they would work for the quarantine alcoholism I’ve acquired. After a night of heavy drinking and taking these, all I remember is going to bed, next to my husband. Woke up face down in the basement guest bedroom with with comforter from the bed I remember last. Absolutely no recollection of how I made it down the stairs or what my husband could have possibly said to make me rob him of our comforter. Woke up feeling completely fine. I should have woken up feeling like crap because of my alleged drunk behavior but I felt completely fine. Anyway, game changer with these pills 10/10 and will absolutely be purchasing again.

This is being reveiwed by Debra Blenman. I usually take this when I have had a little too much to drink.  In my case 2- 3 glasses of wine over  2-3 hrs can cause unwanted effects .  I am 5'3", 150lb female (no I am not Kevin, this is my husband's acct-lol)  I take 2-3 capsules and I really feel it helps alot, no headache, no nausea the next morning.I always keep it in stock at home for those times I over indulge with alcohol.  I did have an event where I drank more then the above over the course of the evening (about 5 hrs) and took 3 capsules, what a difference in my re-coup time and no real hangover.  my past experience would have had me sick for 24 hours the next day which is why I rarely over indulge.  Good to know when it does happen I have  something to assist me recoup.

I've been using these pills since I saw the product on Shark Tank earlier this year. The best thing about these pills that makes them stand out to me is that you take them AFTER a night of drinking rather than before. No one ever plans to drink too much, but when you have a night out or a fun bachelor/bachelorette weekend, sometimes you over do it.  They work really well and I highly recommend them. Keep in mind that if you drink WAYYY too much, these pills can only help so much, but even so, they make a HUGE difference. Once you hit your 30's, hang-overs are an all-day thing and these pills certainly help avoid the pain. I also recommend buying the 3 pack to save money.

Read the studies on this stuff. First, 1 or 2 pills is plenty, not 3.It was studied as an anti-intoxicant and that’s a bonus. Going to a party etc. and worried about drinking and driving? Take this first and you will be much less drunk. Can be a lifesaver.The same effect lessens the hangover. Not a cure, but a helpful treatment.I highly recommend it.Save your liver!

I have tried at least a dozen different hangover prevention/remedy supplements. Needless to say, I get killer hangovers. This one actually does have a positive effect!Look, we all have our threshold, where if we go over that amount, nothing short of divine intervention will keep us from feeling like death the next morning. For me, that's 5-6 drinks. If I go over that, I am screwed. However, if I stay within that limit, get some sleep, remember to drink *some* water throughout the night, and take 3 of these before bed - I feel almost like a real human being the next day.Side note - if you get killer hangovers - research congeners. I've (mostly) given up my beloved bourbons and whiskeys in favor of clear spirits and lighter beers.If you're in the market for one of these products, I recommend you try this one first. I just purchased my second bottle. It is expensive, but for me, it's worth it.
Review Title: It actually works! To a point..

Review Text: These work, period! They basically hydrate you back up to help offset the effects of a hangover while you sleep. The only problem? Remembering to take them before you go to bed after a few glasses of your preferred poison! Keep them on your nightstand or medicine cabinet and set a reminder before you go. Now I’m not saying you won’t have ANY symptoms if you really threw down but if it’s moderate consumption you will likely feel perfectly fine the next day, maybe a tinge of hangover symptoms. If you just have a couple glasses of whatever, then you won’t even remember having done so the next day. These are magically little pills to help with all of life’s special occasions or just weekly happy hours.

Really bummed to write a poor review for this product. Upon receiving it, I realized the capsules were made out of gelatin. I’m sure that was something I could have figured out prior to purchasing but I was really surprised that this is the case based on the cost of this product.  I can’t attest to the quality of the product itself because I can’t stomach the thought of taking them. I won’t be purchasing again until they invest in a plant based capsule!

I have suffered from varying degrees of body and soul-crushing hangovers for just shy of 15 years or so, and I've scoured the earth trying to find an effective remedy, potion, magic spell, etc. I thought I had tried everything under the sun with nothing offering the relief I sought, and then I heard the CEO of Cheers on the radio talking about this product. I was cautiously optimistic based on the science-backed process he described in creating this product, and I am excited to say this is the one I've been hoping to find. Big disclaimer: Cheers will not magically wipe away a hangover completely. It does exactly what the advertising says which is that is will make you feel at least 50% better, but frankly that twice as good as I've ever experienced.

I've heard of this product before but was always skeptical. Being in my thirties now, it hurts when I drink. You all know what I'm talking about. I had a vacation coming up and had to do something since I couldn't take 10 bottles of pedialyte with me.I put this product to the ultimate test. A 7 day cruise with the unlimited drinks package! Needless to say I took full advantage of that deal and had at least 25 drinks a day. Probably more. I was blasted the whole week on that cruise and this stuff actually worked! I was pleasantly surprised. I was able to go about my days with ease. For the record, its no magic pill but the closest thing to it. You still need to drink plenty of water and eat once in a while but once you do that, thrive takes care of the rest. I should mention that I took this with a multivitamin. But before thrive came along, the multivitamin approach did not work out. Still feel it hard the next day.Thrive takes away nausea, restores your bodies necessary nutrients and kind of brings you back to a somewhat fresh start.You all know that depleted feeling we get after drinking all day. Its the main thing that holds you back the next day. Thrive gets rid of that horrible depleted feeling, like your life force has been drained.Thats why this product is awesome and why I'll be using it for a long time.Thanks for making this product. I appreciate it greatly.

We live in New Orleans, so you guessed it, we drink. Not a ton but on occasion, yeah, it gets crazy. I have used this product several times over Mardi Gras season (6 weeks), and it's definitely helped. I'm not saying I feel like 100%, more like 75%, but it's way better than the alternative which is couch surfing cuz I'm too hung over to even think about doing anything. Just remember to eat before you go to bed, take the pills and yes drink the hydration powder. It really helps the next day! :-)
Review Title: Not a cure, but definitely feel better the next day.

Review Text: Not gonna lie. This stuff works. The capsules work and the fizzy yummy  hydration  is great, but probably you could do Pedialyte ,ginger caps and water with the capsules at bedtime too for less money. It’s kinda overpriced and for a product that legitimately claims to provide some mitigation ( not poison control, people, come on) and even health benefits (their liver support, yo) HI but for reals if you lowered your price you’d legit have an opportunity to quantify that your product is the best out there, as more people would try Cheers for the first time and then they’d know.And they’d share or gift it. Total win-win.
Review Title: Works great, still a bit pricey even with subscription

Review Text: I have to say I was pleasantly surprised trying this out over the holidays. A friend of mine had a bottle while going on a brewery tour and offered me some at the end. I was already getting a headache, so I tried it. The next morning, I felt pretty good. Not perfect, but no splitting headache like I usually get when I overindulge. I ended buying a bottle for myself and have tried it several more times over the holidays including New Year's eve. In all cases, I woke up pain-free. My head was still a little cloudy, but I was able to fully function. This stuff is a little pricey, but it works well enough that I will be buying more.

I'm a sceptic when it comes to hangover remedies but this product actually works as described. This was recommended by a family member that enjoys social drinking just as much as i do. Both of us have very serious work rolls and need to be accountable for a lot.What i like for presentation is the description the manufacturers give in their little write up, clearly managing the purchaser's expectations and stating this product is no magic bullet but one will be able to function the day following a few drinks. Kudos to them for that. The proof is in the pudding as the saying goes but in this case the proof is in the feeling the day after taking these pills - kudos again, function not at 100% but definitely not below 50%.I definitely recommend this to the social drinker that may have a few more than should if you have meetings the following day. Nothing to loose here just gains.

I don't understand what it is about this stuff, but every time I take it I wake up severely depressed and then the rest of my day is severely anxiety-ridden. That's not a normal thing for me, so I wonder if this happens to others? If it should be part of a disclaimer? It's honestly worse than the potential hangover and most of the time I'm still hungover. Not worth it to me; not at that price. I love the idea though. I gave the rest of my stash to a couple friends and they said it worked for them, so I give it 3⭐⭐⭐ for that.Also, the "hydrate" powder is a total rip-off. There are plenty of electrolyte powders out there you can buy by the box for less than $20. Just drink coconut water and an emergen-c packet for fox sake.

For years I struggled with the worst hangovers that would keep me in bed sick to my stomach all day long. Even one glass of wine with dinner might make me throw up the next morning. I tried everything under the sun looking for a remedy with no relief and I eventually gave into the conclusion that I have a severe intolerance to alcohol. Then for Christmas last year, my husband gave me Cheers and it changed my life. I have not been sick from a hangover in a year and a half! This stuff is magical and it truly works!!
Review Title: God's gift to people who enjoy alcohol

Review Text: These pills are way too big!!! First pill I took, I thought I was gonna need the Heimlich maneuver to just be able to breathe again! Next pill? Not as bad but I was gonna be damned before I tried to take the third (recommended dose)...Next time, almost the same thing. Maybe my esophagus is too narrow but my throat was literally in pain for at least 48 hours after each time I took these horse pills. Having to physically force them down with my finger is not just unpleasant but shouldn’t be a problem in the first place!!Did they work?? Yes... will I be willing to pay for more?? The jury is still out. I have a bottle full left yet so.... we’ll see. Seems like more work for me (at least, “me”) than its really worth. Party Smart works just as well, for basically the same price/dose and they’re not hard to consume. 🤷🏻‍♀️

This works!! I was so skeptical when my sister told me about these. But was frustrated that even one glass of wine in the evening would often leave me with a headache in the morning. This is has made all the difference!! No more headaches. I have even tried it after having a few cocktails with friends  which I used avoid since I would always feel so crummy the next day. If I take Cheers with 2 ibuprofen before bed I feel perfectly fine the next day! No upset stomach, headache, or fatigue.The capsules are a bit big, that’s my one small con,  but otherwise I think this product is fantastic!!

So far so good. I get really bad incapacitating hangovers with extremely bad anxiety that typically lasts all day long the day after I’ve been drinking. Multiple times now I’ve taken three pills just before bed and wake up forgetting that I might have had one too many the night before because I feel like my normal self. I’m amazed at how well these have worked for me. I just ordered a bottle a few weeks ago and have another on the way (husband has also been using and works well for him too).  I recommend giving it a shot if you have hangovers that make you hate life after a night of libations.

It worked to prevent a hangover!  Had a party with some other couples and drank probably what amounts to an entire bottle of wine.  I did drink 2-3 bottles of water and ate during the evening as well.  Took 3 pills right before bed, and strangely couldn't sleep all night.  The sleeplessness could have been totally unrelated, but could also have been an adverse reaction to this product.  But - you would think that the next morning, especially if I hadn't slept much all night, I'd feel like a train wreck.  Nope!  Got up at 7, made breakfast, went for a walk, and although I was tired, I generally felt fine.
Review Title: It actually worked - but *may* have caused sleeplessness.

Review Text: First off, I wana start by saying I was super skeptical due to the price and I’m sure nobody wants to pay that kind of money without peace of mind. I’m here to tell you, DO IT!
