I drank in excess over the weekend, I took 3 capsules after my last drink Saturday l and I was up till about 3am that night continuously drinking having a great night! I woke up feeling perfectly fine! If you stay up super late, these will not magically give you energy, so still expect to be tired, but hey! You won’t be hungover! Win!
Review Title: I was skeptical, but wanted to try it myself! 9/10! Recommend!

Review Text: Be Careful-I took this product the evening that I received it after having around 4 drinks and 1 shot, woke up the next morning with blurred vision in one eye. Spent the next 2 days in the Neurosurgery ICU having every test in the book run. I had no major issues at the end of the tests, thankfully, but the neurologist could not rule out that this was a reaction to this product since it was the only change in my routine. Again, I don’t know if this was the cause, just giving a heads up to everyone.

As I've gotten older, I have been getting severe headaches after a couple glasses of wine so have pretty much stopped drinking wine. I knew this Thanksgiving we would have wine after dinner so thought this would be the perfect time to give it a try. I drank two glasses of wine and didn't feel overly loopy and usually this would of generated a huge headache and a crummy feeling most of the next day.  As I laid in bed the next morning, there was ever the slightest thud in my head but not terrible like it would be without Thrive+ and  the minute I got up it went away and overall felt pretty good the rest of the day.  I will always have it on hand and take some. Who wants to feel crummy if I can avoid it.  Thanks for this product.

I get bloodwork every few months and since taking this product my kidney and liver function results were all out of whack (they’re always normal)— and nothing has changed other than taking this medication. I am in healthcare so I am definitely concerned that this product may cause harmful Side effects. Not to mention I did not notice any benefit from taking AT all after taking a few times. Scared to try again so I guess I’ll throw them out.

Holy crap! I've been getting hangovers WAY easier than years before beginning around age 28....Im 32 now. I used to be able to consume 10-15 shots then wake up 6 hours later and go to work - exhaisted but functional.... Now days it's extremely sporadic how I will feel the next day....some times I'll have 6 neers and be bed-stricken until 6 or 7pm the next day for sone reason:X.  Other times I will consume 10 shots and wake up a little tired but overall good. It's really hit & miss these past couple of years and I hate the unpredictability!  I have ised Cheers 5-6x over the past month as an experiment.  It works 100% of the time for me!! The improvement was definitely noticeable on my 1st use of Cheers. This is most certainly improving my quality of life on the days I decide to drink and I would absolutely recommend it to anyone lopking for some improvement in their day-afters!

This Hangover Cure is the real deal! While I’m not a normal heavy drinker (3 kids to take care of, doesn’t allow it!), I’ve had my fair share of “I drank too much” nights. Most recently, celebrating a friend’s birthday, I for sure thought I was in for a night of restless sleep and a following day of agony! One glass of water and 3 pills of Thrive+ followed after a HEAVY night of drinking and I felt like I found myself the cure. Not only did I sleep for a solid 7 hours STRAIGHT (this NEVER happens when you get into your late 30s after drinking) but I felt so good when I woke up, I hit a 80min hot yoga session to boot the next morning. 🙌🏼 I’m not saying I was my 100% self, however I was functioning AND productive. And that, my friends, is what we call a WIN! This will no doubt be in my bag on my next trip to Vegas for the true test!!!

I purchased this product due to seeing multiple ads on social media. I was a little skeptical as to the effectiveness and the price, but I thought I would give it try for those nights where perhaps that extra glass of wine wasn't needed. I've tried this product (two instead of the three recommended pills) a few times at this point and have been pleased with the results. No stomach queezy-ness, no foggy-ness - it has been great! Highly recommend for those who want to make sure they can bounce back after a night of cocktails.

I finished my first bottle and just ordered three more. While it will by no means make your 10 drink binge be hangover free, it definitely erases a few drinks. I typically do one everytime I have 2 glasses on wine or 1 mixed drink, regardless of how much I drink (ex 6 glasses of wine would be 3) and it has worked extremely well. When I go all out, I'll take three, and the next day isn't nearly as bad. Without it, I would be stuck in bed unable to do anything (would only get out of bed when my doordash arrived) - now I have no issue running a few errands or so the next day. Makes traveling much better the day after weddings, etc as well. 100% worth the price, and way better than pedialyte.

Don’t ask me me how this stuff works. But it absolutely does. I’ve only taken two at a time before bed  (not three like it recommends) and it really does cut in half the after effects of drinking. I’ve had it for about a month and a half now, taken occasionally, and it absolutely works. I love this stuff, albeit very expensive. If it was in the $25 range it would be better. However they claim that it’s good for your body so I guess it’s maybe worth it. Again, no clue how it works but it actually does...

As I got older, I found that I had a hard time drinking any alcohol at all. Even an occasional beer would leave me feeling stomach discomfort and a general malaise the next day. After not drinking much for months, I saw and add for Cheers and thought I'd give it a try.Full disclosure: Some of the improvement may have gone from my long layoff from drinking or other health improvement factors. However, I do feel that Cheers helps. I typically take a tablet or two after having a beer or two and haven't had the same stomach discomfort or crappy feeling the next day.Though I RARELY binge drink, there have been a couple occasions where I've had a lot of beverages and then capped the night off with 3 tablets. On those occasions, I've generally felt much better in the morning than I would have in the past. It's not a miracle - I still noticed some effects from drinking - but I certainly felt way better than I would have expected if I had the same amount w/o taking Cheers in the past.
Review Title: Cheers has helped me enjoy an occasional drink again

Review Text: I’m a bartender and am able to drink on the job. The more I drink with customers, the more tips I make. Unfortunately this could be a problem depending on how much I drink ... When I know I’ve had too much, I take a Lyft home and take 3 pills before bad and suck down a couple glasses of water. The next morning, things seem a fuzzy and slow BUT NO HANGOVER. No headache, no nausea, no anxiety.BUT ... if you think you can get away with trying to take these after a night of getting completely annihilated to the point of throwing up ... obviously it won’t work... because you’re throwing it back up (duh).

I’ve been meaning to review this several months now, but I thought I’d give it one more try. I bought these for my girlfriend because she gets horrible hangovers, even if she doesn’t excessively consume. She threw up so bad the same night she ingested the pill. I thought maybe it was just her stomach not agreeing with the ingredients. So one night I decided to try it. I woke up in the middle of the night and hit the floor running to the bathroom, it made me throw up as well, and I don’t ever throw up!  I was scared to try them for a second time, but even with lack of confidence in this pill, I decided to try one more time. Same result, I still have about a full bottle, won’t be using it again, sorry

I bought this when it was Thrive and loved it. I bought it as Cheers now and I had 5 beers at my boyfriends double header softball game, took 3 pills with a giant glass of water when we got home, drank water all night, it’s noon the next day and I’m still feeling super crummy. The Cheers pill didn’t do anything. My boyfriend also took 3 with a giant glass of water and felt horrible this morning as well. I miss the thrive recipe! The new cheers recipe doesn’t work.

This works, due to the DHM ingredient. I was amazed. However, it gives me massive amounts of gas to the point it is barely worth it. I haven't determined if it is there additional ingredients or the DHM itself that is the cause, but this wasn't a one-off and I have positively correlated the extraordinary gas with this product. And it really is extraordinary gas, like unbelievable.
Review Title: This works, shockingly. However, it causes me massive gas

Review Text: Expensive snake oil product straight from reality TV. I should have know better. I am a frequent drinker (especially on weekends) and after trying this product 5 times it does absolutely nothing. I think for those it "works" for....it is more because you want it to...classic placebo effect. You're better off sticking to the tried and true - eat something, and drink lots of water. Don't waste your money on these overpriced, overhyped horse pills. If I could give this product zero stars I would.
Review Title: Don't waste your money - they don't work

Review Text: I ordered this for my fiance who is having more trouble with the effects of alcohol after hitting age 40. She can definitely tell a difference after taking this. She has used it a few times now and always awake feeling better than she would have otherwise. The one thing it does not help with (but it does not claim to) is how alcohol can affect one's sleep cycle. She still ends up falling asleep after drinking and then waking in the night and is awake for some hours before being able to fall back asleep. But this aid does help with headache as well as the general body aches and bad feeling that can come after drinking.
Review Title: Does not help with interrupted sleep but helps overall bad feeling

Review Text: Here’s why I know this is legit...I used it for about 3-4 months. I noticed a big difference for a light business drinking event, at home couple glasses and even yes the occasional why did I drink so much. I would have noHangover for the first two and very functional next morning. For the extreme ones it Definitely got rid of the jitters, hangxiety, and able to function BUT I still had nausea for a few hours and fatigue compared to 1-2 day hangover without it, but after that I was good sometimes a nice breakfast burrito, water and coffee after. Lastly I took a break from it and did the above three levels of drinking, maaan I felt my age again and just so bad!! I just went back to using it again this past week and back to good times. It works, I feel and tested the difference!! Amazing job Cheers!!

I don't need flashy flyers, a ton of convoluted cardboard, a thick glass jar, and branded pill cases. Reduce your overhead and be a little nicer to the environment. Sell them in larger sizes in a plastic bottle and reduce the price.I find when I take these after a night of being ridiculous, they help a lot, with both the physical symptoms and the mental. So aside from the overindulgent marketing, these are good.

Seems to work. I have a fairly high alcohol tolerance but the older I get, the worse my hangovers get. I don't drink to the point of hangover very often anymore but I tried these pills on Halloween when I drank a good amount, and it really seemed to help the next day. I did not avoid ALL symptoms of heavy drinking; I was still tired and a little grouchy. But not at all what it would normally be like. My stomach wasn't even upset.Reading 1-star reviews of people who get hangovers after only a few glasses of wine or a couple of beers... maybe the product doesn't work as well for them. Like I said, I have a high tolerance (annoyingly so) and it helped a lot with my hangover.

I’ve been using this since it was Thrive+. And it works. It’s amazing. Life changing. If you can enjoy a drink and not feel like you got hit by a large object in the morning, wow, what a difference. I can go to the gym after taking this. It’s a true miracle product. My only complaint is when they rebranded and changed the packaging, the amount of powder in the rehydration solution decrease by half; but the price stayed the same. Total bummer. You will pay a pretty penny for this product, and may I recommend you the the trio of supplement, plus after drinking powder and pills, it’s a trifecta you won’t regret.
Review Title: Amazing Miracle Product! Not Cheap but a worth it.

Review Text: I always hated the feeling of waking up after having a few drinks and feeling sluggish... I cancel a work out, take a nap, or just "get through the day".... since trying cheers after drinking I have not had to do any of those things I mentioned and the best part is I have no nauseous feeling and don't feel like I need greasy food the next day! I have tried other "hangover cures" that you take before bed and it gives me a jittery feeling causing me to feel anxious and not able to get a good night sleep... I have had no such effects from taking cheers... I will say you still need to drink responsibly (I had a night were I got carried away took cheers and woke up feeling MUCH better than I would without taking it but did have the "get through the day feeling").  I have shared with many friends and everyone I have shared it with is also a big believer!

I went on a 3 day trip where a ton of drinking was involved. I always get bad hangovers so had huge hopes going in with this. First night I only took 2 pills and felt horrible the next morning. Next 2 nights I took 4 pills each night and woke up ok.  In all honesty, I think my old trick of eating a small cucumber and drinking pedialyte before going to sleep worked about the same and was much cheaper.  Thrive was definitely better than doing nothing though. In the future, I'll only be buying this if I'm flying and don't want to carry bulky pedialyte bottles.

This might seem like a product that's too good to be true, but I think it actually works pretty well. It definitely takes the edge off after having one too many, especially when you use it along side their other product (the powder mix). There was a pretty noticeable difference after waking up the next morning, and I'd say I bounced back quicker than I normally would.There will probably never be a true "cure" for hangovers, but if you're looking for something to really help, I would give it a shot. It's a little pricey, but if you aren't a big drinker than one bottle will last you awhile.

Takes about 80% of my hangover away.  I recently went to New Orleans for three days, I took 3 pills every night before bed, along with an aspirin, and felt relatively fine the next day.  Also, I notice I sleep better when I take these.  As you know, by the time you hit your 30s, alcohol plus sleep doesn’t go as smoothly as it did in your 20s.  I also noticed that taking it three days in a row actually made them work better, although I don’t recommend day drinking for three days straight.  I wish I didn’t have to take three pills, it’s kind of a pain, but I would recommend these, they definitely do something to lessen my hangover.

I really like the peppermint after taste of these.. however, for these to be most effective you have to take a few after your last drink. I will never in a million years be able to remember to take pills after a night of drinking :(. They help a little if you take them in the middle/ beginning of the night but I can’t confirm their effectiveness after your last drink cause it’s literally impossible for me to remember. Packaging is glass, so A+ there! Also the koozie is my favorite part!

I know you're saying, I know, I've fallen for this before but you haven't.  Because I had too (patches, pills, you name it) and I thought these people seem smart, from Princeton and this is allegedly new tech so what's $35 toward saving so many next-days.  So I tried it not expecting any miracles but w a healthy skepticism and lo and behold, I realized an hour into a meeting that I was still drunk, felt fine instead of super bad like an hour before and I didn't even remember to take it the night before but the morning of.  I swear by this stuff and am on my 2nd bottle now.

I have this on auto order already. HOWEVER- much cheaper to just get the same supplements in this “vitamin” and take them instead of buying Thrive. I wish I had more info on this company as MOST supplement production use fillers and you will not get what your body needs and certainly not what you pay for. If you have money to burn and your lazy, you could give it a shot

The media could not be loaded.                                                                                   I’ve woken up after a night of fun and drinking wishing i had these.  Sometimes  if you don’t drink enough water while drinking alcohol you can wake up next day feeding the pain.  So i bought these after alcohol aids to make my recovery from drinking a lot smoother. They are packaged neatly and even come with a drink cozy as a gift . Lol which i thought was cute since it is a hangover recovery pill.

I used to get terrible, debilitating nausea after drinking. I have been using Thrive+ capsules and the mix and wake up like a new person. I have tried Morning Recovery, didn’t really work. I have tried Blowfish, same thing. I cannot say enough amazing things about this combo and will never not have this after a night out. Thank you Thrive+
Review Title: The Holy Grail of hangover cures.

Review Text: Taking Cheer is certainly better than not doing anything after drinking or relying on just water, but obviously you are going to still feel something the next day depending on your age and how much alcohol you've consumed. In my experiences Cheer is more effective for me than water or even electrolytes. You can save money by purchasing the major ingredients separately but having them all in a single capsule is convenient.
Review Title: Does the job to a point

Review Text: I think what a lot of reviewers fail to realize is that Cheers only claims it will make you feel at least 50% better than if you hadn’t taken it. I’ve tried it three times, and based on that claim alone, it did work. Most recently, I woke up still tired from the late night, and a little foggy. By afternoon I was functioning and able to work out, as opposed to the two day debilitating hangovers I have without taking Cheers. It is a little pricey, but when it comes down to it, $3 a hangover isn’t so bad.

I am a 44 yr old woman who now, unfortunately, gets a hangover from 2 nice pours of wine. Makes me so mad! But such is life. Cheers does actually seem to help me. It is definitely not a license to go party your face off & think you’ll be fine the next day like in my 20’s. Tried that, didn’t work. After a bottle of wine, or a few nice cocktails, I take 3 pills & don’t completely hate my decisions the next day. I’m on my 2nd bottle & will order more to have on hand. Cheers!
Review Title: I will keep Cheers on hand

Review Text: OK, so I am prone to headaches after even after one drink. I was a little concerned about my trip to Napa Valley with  multiple wine tastings lined up so I bought this. Please note that I didn't take it as directed since I was drinking during the day- I actually took one capsule at each winery we visited, then a couple more before bed. I did not have a single headache. Yes, I was still tired the next day from staying up late- but not hungover and no headache during the day. This is a game changer for me. Yes, it's pricey but for someone who sufferers with headaches it's worth any price to prevent them.
Review Title: worked for me in Napa Valley!

Review Text: I used to put bottles down a day like it was going out of style. Now 30, I can’t hang like I used to. So gave this a shot. Felt like I was still drunk a little bit in the morning but once that subsided I felt ok for a couple hours. Then I had a headache, body aches and some nausea. It feels like it delayed the symptoms and not much else. Not that impressed. Kinda wish I hadn’t wasted my money
Review Title: Ehhhh. Helps a tiny bit I guess.

Review Text: I normally don't write reviews unless the product is terrible (people should know) or stand out amazing (people should know). This cheers supplement is incredible, it actually makes me feel so much better the morning after a "couple" of drinks. Sometimes I take it while I'm drinking, sometimes the morning after and it works just as well. The flavor is great! Lemony lime-ish. I highly recommend this. It's is well worth the price if you drink and enjoy not feeling terrible the next day!

I was skeptical, however after using this during a couple nights drinking I felt drastically better the next day.  I am not a heavy drinker, but will drink 5-8 weeks on a Friday or Saturday.  I took 2-3 before I went to bed and felt perfectly fine the next day.  I generally will feel a little foggy or tired the next morning after a few beers, but when using these its like I never had anything to drink.  I highly recommend giving these a shot!

I was skeptical at first with any supplement that claims to help you avoid a hangover, however I was delightfully surprised by this product! You simply take 3 pills with water before bedtime or after drinking, and I wake up feeling normal. No headache! These work if you drink a "normal" amount that evening - these do not work if you binge drink or blackout - they are not miracle pills, but they actually do work to help you avoid any unnecessary hangovers the day following an event where you consumed alcohol. Highly recommend!

I'm not sure if it helps or not (more concerned with my liver's health than with next-morning effects) but I still have a headache the next day after taking 4 *and* hydrating well during the drinking night.  I will say that I've ordered it 4 times and 2 of those it came in ridiculously wasteful box packaging that probably explains why it's so expensive.  That waste alone makes me not want to order again.  Have some consideration for the environment, if your product is that good you don't need to grandstand with massive packaging.

I was extremely skeptical about this because it just seemed too good to be true. I’m in my mid 30s and I find that as the years go on, I just can’t recover from a night of social drinking like I used to. I don’t go out that much anymore, but when I do, my hangovers these days are brutal headaches and nausea- so I was willing to try it. I figured I’d give it the ultimate test and take it on New Year’s Eve night haha. I woke up STUNNED... I seriously felt like I hadn’t even gone out the night before. I was completely good to go and had a totally productive day. I’ll FOR SURE be keeping this in stock in the medicine cabinet!

I don’t drink very often. But occasionally I will go out and drink a bit too much and regret it the next morning. I bought these pills thinking why the hell not. I had tried Thrive previously (similar product, different company) and never noticed a difference. I’ve tried them several times now and boy do they make a difference. If more than a couple I will take the pills before bed and when I wake up I don’t feel like absolute death. I never feel 100% after a night of drinking , because well dehydration but these pills absolutely improve the situation. I typically wake up with a major headache, feels like my brain is floating and a sour stomach. I wake up feeling okay to take on the day after these pills and a night of drinking. I will continue to buy these to avoid losing the day after drinking to just recovering.
Review Title: If you’re going drinking, you need this!

Review Text: This product is a day after lifesaver for me! While I don’t go out often, when I do I definitely consume a good amount of alcohol. I always set it out on the counter so I remember to take it before I go to bed. I definitely still feel tired the next day but it takes away the killer hangover feeling. Both my husband and myself will not drink without having it on hand. Lifesaver for this 40 something girl!

As I've gotten older, I've found my hangovers have gotten worse and worse. Finally I got fed up with sorry state of affairs. So I did some rooting around the internet, and Cheers looked like one of the best options, so I gave it a shot.If I take it at the end of an evening of moderate drinking, I wake up the next morning and can actually be a functional human being. I don't feel *amazing*, but I feel much better than I would have otherwise. For the cost of a can of the cheapest beer the bar has, that's a steal.

I have used these a few times, and they have worked in reducing the hangover I should have been feeling.  My usual dose is 3 with a glass of water before bed.The next morning I may feel a little groggy, slow, or tired, but I definitely feel better than when I forget to take them.

I’ve tried all sort of hangover cures and this is the first one where there is a noticeable difference every time I take it vs not taking it. I am noticeably less nauseous and tired the next day. It doesn’t need to be taken with anything else either! Would definitely recommend if you are out of commission when hungover

I tried this on two different occasions.  At the end of the night, I took 3 capsules with a big glass of water. My first try, waking up in the morning felt no different than if I had not taken them. My second try, I woke up through out the night feeling extremely full. In the morning and through out the following day, I still had the awful feeling of being full (but didn't eat anything). I am going to be contacting for a refund. After the second try, I dont ever want to feel that way again.

So I know what you're thinking... this is kinda expensive and does it work? It works 100%! You take 3 of these before bed and you wake up feeling like a million bucks! As for the expensive part, let me break it down for you... There are 12 servings, for the price of $34.99, which makes it $2.92 a serving. A) That's less than one of the beers you bought at the bar last night and B) I'd bet you'd be willing to pay 10x that amount to get ride of a handover the morning of. So a bit of an up front cost, but you'll be happy you had the investment when your entire next day isn't ruined!

There are only 2 ingredients that I wasn't already taking to mitigate hangover effects, but this is much more convenient than taking multiple herbs/vitamins.  It does work, although I am so sensitive to alcohol that perhaps I'm not the best test subject - I used to get hangover symptoms after 1 drink & I no longer do by using this. I found the accompanying powder to taste vile, a friend of mine got severe heartburn from it and it is more expensive but no more effective than other re-hydration products, so that is the reason for the 4 stars....pills are great, the powder is not in my opinion.
Review Title: Convenient way to take typical herbs to lessen hangovers

Review Text: I'm a 29 y/o female. Not a heavy drinker - maybe drink up to 3 glasses of wine 1-2x a month. Normally the day after drinking I feel foggy, sluggish, sensitive to sun, with stomach/digestive issues and a headache. Now after drinking I take up to 3 pills at night with a glass of water. I wake up with NONE of those symptoms.I love how Cheers continues to update their product but I do not like the citrus tab they place in the bottles. When I take these pills after a night of drinking, i don't want to smell something that is reminiscent of citrus vodka.

I usually love cheers vitamins usually but for 35 dollars, having 5 capsules either fall apart or almost fall apart is really annoying. It showed up busted today before opening the package. We are going out of town Sunday and don’t have time to return them for new ones so we will just deal w it. Buyer beware of this when buying off Amazon

I'm fairly sensitive to alcohol, and I've tried a few other unsuccessful "hangover cures" in the past (Vitamin B, coconut water, potassium, Party Smart, etc.). I was therefore skeptical that any miracle supplement would provide relief from the headache, upset stomach, and mental fog I typically experience after a night out, but I was pleasantly surprised by Thrive--the ingredients DO seem to prevent the onset of hangover symptoms. I'd still advise drinking lots of water and getting plenty of sleep, but if you're prone to hangovers, popping a few Thrive pills might really help. The only downside is price; these pills are quite expensive. However, the price seems justifiable for infrequent use during those occasions when I'd otherwise feel terrible!
Review Title: Definitely improves mental clarity and reduces/prevents headache

Review Text: This product works! I sometimes overindulge but need to be up and active in the morning, and it comforts me to know that I’m supporting my long-term health by taking this product. Hangovers have been minimal, and I wake up feeling alert and ready to face the next day. I’m not one to immediately embrace a product just because Shark Tank has endorsed it. In this case, however, I think they’ve picked a winner. The capsules are easy to take and have improved my quality of life significantly!

I have always been particularly susceptible to bad hangovers and vomiting after drinking, but Cheers has saved me! I haven’t vomited once after drinking while taking Cheers, and my hangover symptoms are definitely reduced. It doesn’t eliminate the hangover symptoms if you’ve had too much to drink, but it definitely helps - your whole day isn’t a wash because of a hangover anymore. I love that you can just take it before bed (with lots of water!) and wake up feeling decent. Great stuff!

Definitely reduces hangovers. My main gripe is how few servings there are at this price point... only 12. Feels like they are spending way too much on unnecessarily expensive packaging, leading to an inflated price. This comes in a cute little box where the tub is all propped up, there were 2-3 printed pieces in the box, the container is thick heavy duty plastic, and they have some sort of mint scented thing in the container that makes it smell nice when you open it. All of those pieces cost additional money to produce - none of them are necessary.

I don’t want to appear like I am alcoholic, but I love wine and hangovers come quite easily even after a couple of glasses. That’s why I love the Cheers product. I wake refreshed with little or no hangover symptoms. Sometimes I feel better than days I didn’t drink anything the night before. It’s a little pricey, but they are worth it. I tried a couple of other brands that did nothing. I like the peace of mind knowing that I don’t wake up feeling terrible after enjoying a nice bottle of red with a friend. My only negative is the packaging. It’s gorgeous, but totally unnecessary. I end up trying to recycle some of it and throwing other parts away. The product sells itself and it doesn’t need all the packaging.

I've been known to toss a few back and now that I'm edging into my mid-30's, that comes with a price.  I've tried several different hangover aids and Cheers is the best one yet.  Pop three of these bad boys after a night (or day) of libations and get ready to wake up without the tell-tale nausea or headache.  You'll still be tired the next morning because alcohol, but it really does mitigate all those other nasty side effects and actually makes it possible to function the next day.  I am also a distance runner and would be curious to give this a try after one of my long run days to see how it helps with recovery. I'd definitely recommend purchasing, it's been a big help.

I'm writing this review after NOT taking Thrive after drinking on New Year's Eve. I arrived home and could not find my bottle of pills, and believe me I paid for it.I am not the kind of drinker who has a glass or two of wine at home every night, so when I go out and have four or five drinks, I normally feel it the next day. Like this morning, when I was dry heaving in the bathroom during brunch.For me, Thrive works best after 4-5 drinks. I wake up feeling like I had 1 or 2. There is still some tiredness, but other symptoms like nausea, headache, etc, are mitigated.This works better than anything I have tried (and I've tried some other supplements). I've been able to get up and work out the next day after having a few drinks. I take the recommended dose of Thrive and a glass of Pedialyte before bed and I wake up feeling better than I should.I just bought my second bottle, and I can't stop raving about it to friends. Highly recommend this product.
Review Title: Game changer for amateur drinkers like myself

Review Text: Seriously wish this stuff was around decades ago! There have been 4 instances where I should've been feeling like I'd been run over by a truck but woke up feeling like nothing ever happened the night before! For real! I'm 38 and don't quite recover the way I once did and having to adult with kids and other adulting requirements it makes it difficult to enjoy one's self as an adult should. This stuff is pure magic! I have recommended to everyone I know plus a few hundred old high school friends and  acquaintances on Facebook. Seriously, do it. You won't regret it!

Cheers guarantees you will feel at least 50% better after an industrious night of hard partying, and I can back that up. I've been buying this consistently for the past six or so months and my hangovers are definitely not as bad on the nights when I remember to take this (ay, there's the rub!). That's even despite the pandemic-level, stave-off-the-existential-dread type of drinking we've all fallen prey to at least a few times recently.They recommend two to four. I usually take three (at that amount, each bottle has 12 doses, so it will last you a while as long as you aren't Charles Bukowski) and that dose works well for me.Remember, nothing is going to make you feel like didn't imbibe AT ALL, but I'll take feeling 50% better than feeling 0% better any day.

2/19/19I have used the product recently, when it was still called Thrive. I just purchased my second bottle, now under the new name Cheers. I first purchased the product for News Years Eve. I was so satisfied with the product that I now continue to use it regularly. I used a bottle in one month and quickly ordered another. I usually took three capsules after I had more than two drinks in one evening. The results were great, woke up feeling ready for the day, with only minor side effects - such as thirst and some gitters. Prior to using the product I experienced bad headaches anytime I had more than two drinks. I also would get an upset stomach easily. I also noticed that I have more freedom mixing different types of alcohol with the product, when prior that would have made my hangover much worse.I apprieciate the company and wish I would have known about it sooner.
Review Title: Where has this product been all my life?!

Review Text: My business partner turned me on to it a while ago.  We entertain clients almost daily, and he is able to have at least a few drinks every time, and still wake up bright eyed and bushy tailed the next day, while I would struggle to function after even just a couple drinks.  I asked him how he does it, and he told me he takes these Thrive pills before bed, and never wakes up with a hangover.  He gave me a couple to try, and now I won't drink without them.  I would give them 10 stars if I could!Full disclosure, if I drink heavily, I'll take up to 3 of these capsules (recommended dosage is 2-4).  The next morning I'll wake up a little groggy, but still with little to no hangover, so I just have a cup of coffee and I'm good to go.
Review Title: On my fourth bottle, love the stuff!

Review Text: This stuff has worked great for me so far! I've used it 4 times I think. You do need to take 3 to 4 pills, so don't skimp or ration them to try to save money. I tried taking just two once and it didn't quite do the trick. But, take the right amount and you'll be feeling fine the next morning- still tired, but, no headache, nausea, or any of the other awful hangover symptoms that can completely ruin your next day. Party on dudes!

I tried this on my weekend away knowing I might over indulge… even if I didn’t k we do it wine always gives me a headache. Well I took it 3 days in a row and it worked! I woke up the next day and didn’t even feel like I had one drink let alone more then I care to admit too 🙈😵‍💫

I never write reviews but I HAVE TOO!! Took for the first time yesterday. I was skeptical, but after so many reviews, I thought it couldn’t hurt. Normally I wake in the night with major heart palpitations and feel crappy all night and throughout the day, but this is the first time in years I haven’t woke up feeling like a 10, and all I have is a headache that’s maybe a 1 and a little sleepy. I normally wake up multiple times in the night I woke up one to potty, which is normal for me any night, felt fine went back to sleep and feel like a 1 this morning for “hangover” from 1-10 when I always am a 10! I’m excited, husband did the same thing and felt great! Already ordering my second shipment! If your skeptical, don’t be! It’s worth every dime!

I’m 60, & I live in NAPA- so on this topic, I’m a PRO!I’ve tried ALL the big ones- Flyby, Detox, plus have bought bulky cases of Morniing Recovery (I was a Kickstarter investor!)But THESE ARE THE BEST.I take 3 before bed, and wake up not only feeling good, but also no anxiety!These have been PUT TO GOOD USE DURING THE PANDEMIC! If you drink, BUY THESE PILLS!

I was VERY skeptical when I ordered this product.  Hangover cure; right?!  To my surprise, it actually does work!!  I had previously never had trouble with hangovers and was able to get up in the morning with relative ease however I am a few years past 40 and my body is changing.  I don't get the terrible headache, vomiting type of hangover but I have a terrible time getting out of bed after I have had a few the night before (TERRIBLE TIME)!  I have taken three Thrive pills on three different occasions since my purchase and it has made all the difference in the world!  I am able to get out of bed when my alarm goes off with no problems and I feel great!  This will be a staple in my medicine cabinet!!

I love Thrive. If I’ve had too much to drink then I will take three of these before bed. I will wake up with a slight hangover and maybe a headache but NO stomach issues at all!  It’s like it takes away any of the stomach issues that come with a hangover. I can handle being tired with a headache as long as I’m not sick to my stomach. I was skeptical at first until I tried it for the first time after attending a bachelorette party and a long night of drinking. I thought for sure that I would be sick all the next day and I wasn’t!  This stuff definitely works for me!

I was skeptical, especially because of the price, however as I get older I tend to have worse hangovers. I spontaneously had quite a few drinks, much more than I would normally drink. Quarantine has people crazy! Anyway, I took the recommended dose before bed and when I woke up I honestly did not feel like I had been drinking the night before besides my dry mouth. I felt good all day at work. Highly recommend this product!

I indulged in quite a few drinks over the weekend and so I took Cheers. I normally wake up tired and feeling nervous without the ability to do anything. The following morning I woke up feeling tired, but not bad at all. I was able to get up and resume my day almost as if I didn't have any alcohol the night before. I then took a nap later on and the hangover was non existent completely. I had the energy to workout and didn't have the next day munchies like I normally do. Try it unless you want to continue feeling like garbage the day after drinking.

From what I can gather, there are a good amount of mix results. My personal experience has been wonderful. Im not a heavy drinker like I was in my 20's, but just one or two capsules after a weekend night of drinking can get rid of the majority of the hangover I would expect. I recently just had a bachelor party with people between the ages of 28- 32 and had everyone try a few after a night of binge drinking. The general consensus was that they worked, and they were up for day two way earlier than normal. I have not tried any other brands, and I might so I have something to compare it to.Perhaps they won't work for you, but it's certainly worth trying.
Review Title: You should try it for yourself

Review Text: This is an amazing product and IT WORKS! You have to follow the instructions though - take 2-4 pills after your last alcoholic drink (if you try 3 and it doesn't work, you may need 4). It absolutely does what it claims to - lessens the effects dramatically the next day of alcohol. I am amazed - and so happy that this is a natural way to aid your body in metabolizing alcohol in a way that lessens the negative effects. If you are doubting whether you should try - don't! It works, 100%. Completely worth the money as well, I feel it's a great price for 30 pills. Very happy with this product and I have continue to keep it stocked. :)

I was first introduced to cheers via an Instagram ad I purchased a trial dose pack. Myself and a friend really tried to push the limits on it and we did so with absolute success. Now, I keep in the house and throw it on my bed before I go out drinking so I can remember to take it upon my return.I wake up feeling better than I do while sober and like I’m ready to take on the day. I’ve suggested it to some of my friends in the past and they had less luck but from my anecdotal experience, it works wonderfully.

I know what you are thinking, "$35 for 36 pills, thats almost $1 a pill! thats too expensive"! well, you spend $10 for one drink at the bar. How much do you spend in one outing? then to wake up the next day hungover? 3 pills can help that almost disappear! i will gladly pay $3 to guarantee i dont suffer the morning after a night of drinking. I am a customer for life.
Review Title: Not as expensive as you think

Review Text: So, I’ve used this 4 times now. The first two times I only had a couple of drinks and took one pill. I woke up feeling completely normal, as if I hadn’t had anything to drink the night before. The next time I had had a bit more to drink and took two pills. I had normal energy and a small headache. Lastly, I took 3 pills after a lot of drinks from a holiday party. Usually I wake in the middle of the night, hot & sweaty, with accelerated heart beat and can’t get back to sleep after drinking a similar amount. I did not have these symptoms after Thrive!! I woke up closer to early morning and had a slight headache, but I didn’t not feel that hazy, sluggish feeling at all! This stuff is the real deal!! Not an excuse to drink more, but a great backup if you do.
Review Title: No night sweats or racing heartbeat after a late night!

Review Text: I don't over do it when I drink, but noticed a few drinks in the evening can give me a slow start the next day. Enter, Cheers and I noticed a difference the next morning and was able to feel much more refreshed than normal. With this said, this is not a review for those taking down a whole bottle of Mr. Daniels, but people are realizing late 30s just gave them a swift kick in the nuts but your brain continues to give you advice from your 20 something self.

I never get too hung over, especially if I drink a lot of water before bed. I was exited to use these as maybe having less of a hangover in the morning. It is now 4:30 pm and i am still dizzy and extremely tired. I only had about 6 seltzers and two mixed drinks, only enough to give me a headache, and yet I am still completely sedated. I have also visited the bathroom for number 2 multiple times today. I will never use these again and, after reading other reviews, I regret ever purchasing it.

I LOVE this product. It’s made in Houston which is awesome! love the transparency in ingredients.But THEY ACTUALLY WORK! On REALLY rough heavy drinking nights (NYE, BIRTHDAY etc.) to just 2 beers, I take these if I drink alcohol at all. I also make a point to chug a large glass of water when taking them. I will not lie they smell awful but are worth every penny. No “taste” but there is a minty/herby subtle aftertaste that goes away after about 30min/1hr.
Review Title: AMAZING, A MUST FOR GOING OUT

Review Text: Please don’t misinterpret this as a cure to drinking all you want and thinking you won’t feel anything the next day.  What I did find is that it took less time to recover the next day. I didn’t have a pounding headache and as the day went on I felt more “normal” faster than usual.  I tried on a day where I had about 4-5 drinks, and the next day I felt fine, like i didn’t drink. When you break down the price per serving, it’s definitely worth the money.  The question is, the day after drinking, what would you pay to just feel better? Would it be $10, $20, more? Then this is definitely a bargain.

I ordered two bottles...one for me, and one for my daughter who was heading down to South Padre for spring break.  I haven't had an opportunity to use the product yet because I haven't tied one on in the last couple weeks, but she came home from spring break raving about it.  She said she drank heavily every day and never had a hangover while all her friends were hurting bad.  I asked if she offered to share with her friends and she said, "no way", so there's a good comparison of someone who took Cheers and someone who didn't.  I'm heading out to a golf trip with 20 guys in a few weeks and I'm certain I'll have an opportunity to use it.  I'll update once I do, but from the perspective of a 22 year old senior in college who was at spring break and drinking heavily, the reviews are very positive.
Review Title: Tested on 22 year old daughter at spring break

Review Text: This is a great product to assist in the detoxification of your body from the toxic effects of alcohol.  The few times that I have used it have been pretty impressive.  My favorite attribute is the absence of the horrible headache that can occur after having a wee much alcohol the night before.  No side effects that I have noted.  My husband also thinks this is extremely effective.  Easy breezy use instructions.  Cost is truly the only negative, especially if you take the maximum dose of five capsules which equates to six uses for one bottle.  All in all, a worthy product to keep in the bathroom cabinet.

I have always been skeptical of hangover cures. Usually I will just try to drink a ton of water and survive the anxiety the next day or do a small workout to try and kick it but I generally get serious hangovers. I saw this on shark tank and a few friends said they believed in it. After a particularly bad wine hangover I ordered a bottle to give it a shot. Honestly it does work and you really can feel it, I think the "50% better" claim is very accurate. You won't wake up feeling like you would after a night of no drinks but and you can almost tell that there is a hangover being kept at bay. I have tested this after drinking 4 bottles of white wine and I was significantly better feeling and less anxious. I already ordered a second bottle but this is the first hangover helper that I have ever written a review for and it is a game changer.
Review Title: Honestly works, Have tested this very heavily!

Review Text: I am the type that is very skeptical about these sorts of things and even laughed at myself when I ordered this to give it a try. There does appear to be real science behind the product though so I decided to give it a try. I have used it twice now and I have definitely felt a difference vs not using. I feel the biggest benefit is an overall feeling of well being vs hangovers usually being a depressive event for me. I haven't woken up with a headache, but there was still a bit of nausea. Like many of the other reviews say it does not completely eliminate symptoms just reduces them. I would have been more skeptical if it promised 100% no symptoms. I would recommend giving it a try. I figure if I am willing to go out and pay $8 a beer for a night out I can pay $4 to make the next day more happy and productive.
Review Title: Definitely helps with the hangover next morning

Review Text: I am a licensed medical practitioner so I was skeptical about this product at first. I can get pretty bad hangovers that include vomiting and dry heaving all day.  I usually take ibuprofen and have to drink lots of water before bed and have a Gatorade waiting for me in the morning. I was really impressed with this product and happily surprised it worked for me. I had forgotten to drink water before bed and had no ibuprofen after a night of drinking and I woke up feeling a little tried but no headache or vomiting! Interesting enough, I am a medical provider in the ICU and we treat liver failure patients with N-acetyl cysteine which is listed as an ingredient here. The price of the product is worth it if you suffer from bad hangovers like myself.
Review Title: Worth it if you have bad hangovers

Review Text: As a parent, you may want to enjoy a glass of wine or a whole bottle from time to time on a Friday night.  Saturday mornings come quick and so do kid events!  This product helps you lot lose a day and can still maintain super-parent status by not being in a head fog for a complete 24 hours.  Best hangover product that is out there and I have tried almost everything on the market.
Review Title: Feel human and you get your day back

Review Text: I really do think these pills work. I keep them in my purse and take them before bed after a night of drinking. I always notice a difference. I wake up feeling more well-rested than I do when I don't take them ( sometimes I swear I even feel more energized like I drank a cup of coffee). I never wake up with a headache, either. They are expensive but highly worth it if you hate dealing with hangovers!

Tried a few times, two of us, and had the worse hangovers ever. I think it made it worse and made us restless at night making it harder to sleep, making the hangover worse.Would not recommend to anyone.I did not have that much to drink when I tried, so it’s not because I drank more than normal. These pills are just trash. That’s two peoples opinions.Throwing away $35

Amazing!!! You can tell this company truly cares about their product. The packaging of the item is so awesome and cute! Not to mention, these pills are life changing!! That’s not an exaggeration. I feel SO much better after I use these. My hangovers are super severe. Now I take a couple of these, chug a water, and really feel like I can take on the world the next day. It’s pretty crazy what a huge difference it makes. I’m obsessed.

These absolutely work! First of all, I’m obsessed with Shark Tank so when I saw an Instagram ad for this product it caught my attention. I decided to give it a try because c’mon... who doesn’t want to alleviate hangovers?! My boyfriend and I each took 3 pills after having several drinks one night and both woke up feeling unusually fantastic. As someone who usually has a headache and feels foggy after drinking, I was super surprised to discover how remarkable I felt the next day (especially as someone who is 100 lbs and had at least 4-5 drinks the night before). We now refer to these as our “Magic Pills” and take them any night we have more than 2-3 drinks. Also the smell and taste are really nice. It’s a bit pricey considering between the 2 of us we go through 6 pills each time, but it’s still worth it!

I ordered a bottle back in November to take during a vacation to Mexico. It worked great. No hangovers the entire trip.I recently purchased another bottle and it just doesn’t work as well. Example: yesterday I had 3 alcoholic beverages all day. Took the product just before bed. Huge hangover this morning.How could it work in Mexico where I was more or less drinking all day (more than 3 drinks) and not work now?  Makes no sense. Must be the formula.
Review Title: Did they change the formula when they changed the name?

Review Text: I took these after I had a few drinks, before bed. The next day I still woke up with a pretty bad headache and dizziness. I didn’t really drink much that night, so that’s extra disappointing.I’ve had much better success with a morning recovery drink. I tried these because they were significantly less expensive - guess I know why

I’ve tried many different after alcohol aid’s and none seem to work all that well. Saw Cheers restore advertised on Instagram so I looked it up and did some research on it. I decided to give it a try and I’m glad that I did because it really does work! It’s not a magic pill so don’t expect to feel 100% the next morning, but I definitely feel at least 75% better than when I don’t take it. Liked it so much that I ordered the protect and the hydrate to try also.

I heard about Cheers in their Facebook ads and so many people were commenting positively that I decided to try it. So far, so good. I'm typing this after a night of wine and beer that would normally leave me with a mild hangover but I feel great. After one use, I'd have to conclude that Cheers works. I will update this review if it doesn't work next weekend.

I have had liver issues and kidney issues in the past prolly due to drinking (not an alcoholic) so I am very concious of how I feel after drinking and what kind of damage I'm doing to my body. That said I still love tequila and a great Napa red wine. I saw this on Shark Tank and it made sense so I tried a bottle. I think this stuff is amazing. I take 3 pills and a glass of water and wake up refreshed like I never had a drink or several the night before. I have  tried a few nights not taking the pills and compared to how I felt the next morning to when I took the pills and there is a world of difference. So much so I just reordered the bigger bottle. Let's face it. Alcohol is a poison but it really taste good. I periodically take a break just to give my liver a break and prolly still will do that but I think these pills really help the body metabolize the alcohol and the byproducts that can leave you tired and sort of ragged out in the morning.  I'm a believer and will continue buying. Cheers!!!
Review Title: Best product for people who like to drink

Review Text: I’m not a heavy drinker by any means, but I do enjoy a few cold beers or couple glasses of wine every now and again. As I started getting older I noticed that even after just two drinks I wouldn’t feel great the next day.  I was sluggish, foggy and only wanted to nap and eat junk food. So, after seeing a couple ads for Cheers I decided to give it a try. Boy was I surprised. Every time I’ve used it I have felt at least 75% better the next day. I was still a little sluggish, but no classic hangover symptoms. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who wants to feel better the day after drinking. I plan to check out their other products next.

This is my current favorite hangover/drinking aid and I’ve tried most of the popular ones out there. It really seems to improve my mental focus in the morning and to be ready for the day. I think the dosage of two is effective, especially given the cost. The price is a bit too high and the reason for my deduction of one star. Great product though.

I'm over 40 and probably have a few drinks more than I should, more often than I should. Since I started taking Cheers after my last beverage, and drink a glass of water, I wake up feeling much better than without it. Honestly, I'm really opposed to drinking more than a couple in an evening if I don't have Cheers with me. It just isn't worth the pain. If you haven't tried this, I recommend giving it a try. Everybody I've given Cheers too have become a believer and a customer by the next morning.
Review Title: If you drink, you need this.

Review Text: I don’t know if this stuff works or not. I can’t even begin to read the Directions. I see the word Directions, but unless I get out a damn magnifying glass and flashlight, I have no idea how to take these little gems. Try improving your packaging first, and then, here’s a novel idea: STOP CHANGING THE NAME!

I've now tried several products I've bought via Instagram and Facebook ads, as well as here on Amazon. Most were liquids that require you to consume before, during, and after alcohol consumption, which is certainly more difficult than this product. I also can't attest to the effectiveness of any of them, hence why I never purchase them a second time.Cheers is great in that you only need to take them when you get home after a night out, but more importantly, I've found them to have positively affect my state of calm the morning after. I don't suffer from headaches and nautiousness that many others associate with hangovers, only from "hangxiety". And so far these are really helping with that. Highly recommended to see if they work for you!
Review Title: Most effective anxiety-tempering product I've used so far

Review Text: I saw this product on Shark Tank when it was called "Thrive+" and was interested in the product.  It was one of those "well, if it really works, that's AWESOME" kinda things.  And I was somewhat surprised when the inventor didn't get any funding on the show.  But it was because of the marketing.  The Sharks did not respond to the marketing.  So, he fixed that.  He changed the name, brought in an artist to do some clever and fun drawings, even added a drink cooler for fun.  The product is the same, so I would be giving this a rave review anyway, but I can see how the marketing could make a difference for sales, so I hope that has helped the company.  In short - it really does work!  It's kind of like refreshing your body with vitamins and plant roots just when you go to bed if you've been drinking.  I've used it and have really felt the difference the next day.  Feeling better with less fatigue and a general overall higher level of productivity.  So, I highly recommend CHEERS!  It will be a mainstay in my bathroom cabinet from now on.

We were introduced to Cheers Restore by some friends and were amazed at how well they helped navigate the day after some moderate to heavy drinking. We sleep better, feel less groggy, and just generally better when we take these after a night of imbibing.The supplements are sent in some fancy-schmancy packaging, with an explanation included that they are required by Amazon to pack that way. The packaging was very eco-friendly, there was just more if it than you would expect.  I'd hope that Amazon considers relaxing that requirement in favor of less packaging.The pills themselves have a minty smell to them which we've found pleasant.Otherwise they just work as promised! We'll certainly be buying more in the future.

So I was skeptical after seeing this episode of shark tank and trying some other DHM remedies out there.  I’m 30 years old now and hangovers are really hitting me hard for like 2 or 3 days after.  Just this weekend I tried them for a bachelor party.  Each day I woke up after drinking 8-10 plus drinks feeling considerably better than usual.  I was even mixing which I usually try not to do.  By Monday morning I felt almost back to my normal self and was able to get in the gym in the afternoon (usually it takes me until Tuesday or Wednesday til I can do that).  I have a wedding coming up and will see if this was just a fluke or my new hangover cure.  So far so good!

My headline kind of sums it up. This is about my 5th order of a bottle of Cheers (formerly 'Thrive') so clearly I'm happy with the results of the product. It only gets  4 stars though because it comes in an over-packaged form which includes a (what I consider cheesy) foam beer cozy. I mean, how many of those do I need?It is an expensive product and I'm not happy about paying for the un-needed extra packaging. There should be an option to order it with minimal packaging. I assume the business model is to try to become a staple need for the target audience and when you buy something over and over you don't want to feel like you're subsidizing the marketing for first time users and adding un-needed materials to our land fills.Otherwise happy with the product and the results.
Review Title: Repeat customer, seems to help, but packaging is excessive and adds to the cost.

Review Text: I tried the Cheers after-alcohol aid this past weekend. I also gave it to three other friends to try it out after a night of drinking. One friend has already purchased the supplement about 24 hours after he tried it. We are all very impressed and satisfied with the effectiveness of this supplement! We are all 28 years or older and have really noticed a significant decline in how effective our body used to deal with a night of drinking. Typically I would wake up with a headache, sometimes body aches, but after using cheers the night before, we woke up much more refreshed. I am excited to continue using this supplement, thank you for creating this product.
Review Title: More ppl need to know about this

Review Text: These magical pills got me through a busy long weekend in Vegas.  We all know how those are, often with just one last drink for the night after walking around all day with a beverage in hand.  With these pills I did not have my usual bad stomach feeling, I was ready to go in the morning! Unfortunately it is not making you less tired if you don't sleep, but hands down I was able to squeeze more into this short trip by not wasting time on suffering and wanting to stay in the dark cool room all day.  Thank you Cheers!

Honestly if you’re old enough to feel the need to buy these, Ie 30+, you’re way too old to read the minuscule packaging. I’m relatable young and have 20/20 vision and that marketing is absurd. Seems like they’re trying to make people feel drunker than they are so they think they need the product.
Review Title: The font is tiny so you think your vision is blurry

Review Text: I’m very sensitive to caffeine. If you are also then please be aware that this stuff kept me awake ALL night, which is worse than having a slight hangover and that’s because bacon and eggs can get rid of a hangover, whereas nothing helps you to get through a sleepless night. Read the ingredients - you will see that it contains tea! And going by my experience the tea is not decaffeinated or only partially decaffeinated.
Review Title: I think this product contains caffeine

Review Text: I hate taking pills due to problems swallowing - takes me a good 5-10 minutes to swallow 5 pills, but as far as I am concerned, it is time well spent when it comes to taking these. No weird after taste or uncomfortable burps.They are pricey but they WORK. Tried them out for my bachelorette weekend and not one issue! Gave 5 pills to each girl that attended, also, and they were shocked that they felt great the next morning (some of them had Zofran but didn't even need to use it bc these worked so well). So myself and my fiancé have been using these steadily ever since. Even my girlfriends continue to use these...and they definitely drink a lot.I'm not a big binge drinker but after a night out, I err on the side of caution and take either 4 or 5 after I'm done drinking for the night. If it is just a casual night at home and I've had 2-3 glasses of my red wine in a short timeframe, then I'll take 3. Will continue to use this indefinitely!
Review Title: Nothing like going to bed confident that you'll wake up ready to go in the morning

Review Text: It comes very close to completely eliminating my hangovers. I might feel a little dizzy the morning after, but not much else. The nausea has been completely solved with this product and I will definitely buy more. You can drink heavily on a work night with this stuff and not have to worry about how you'll feel the next day, it's that good!

Tried these after a night of whiskey shots and beer!  I woke up deathly sick!!  These were recommended to me by my fellow cruisers.  They may work for them, but definitely not for me.  Try the bytox patches they work!!

After a super intense day, I drank 2 glasses of wine during the evening. I was tipsy and I expected to feel pretty bad that night and the next day, however, I took 3 tabs at bedtime and then drank a big glass of water with hydration salts, and, after actually sleeping through the night, the next morning I didn't feel hungover at all!! I felt physically clear, not inflamed, able to teach 2 yoga classes first thing that morning. Yay Cheers!

After turning forty, it seemed like I was paying the next morning for even one extra glass of wine. I was skeptical that his product could help, but after trying it,  I wouldn't drink again without taking Cheers. Sometimes I forget and the difference is drastic the next morning. This is my fourth bottle, so I would definitely buy again.
Review Title: Effective solution for mitigating the effects of hangovers

Review Text: These things are remarkable!  Every now and then, you realize you drank too much and do NOT want to wake up with a hangover. These allow exactly that! Wonderful invention. I do not take trips without packing "cheers" just in case I drink to much and do not want my next day ruined.

I have got to the point in my life where 3 beers will leave me waking up at 4 am with a migraine.This may not be an issue for many and for those it is an issue, it definitely isn’t after 3 beers.However, weak or not, this is the case for me.Taking thrive after a night of drinking, wether is be 3 beers or 12, I have woken up the following day feeling like a damn champion.Get a bottle. Try it. Review it.This stuff works.
Review Title: I have woken up the following day feeling like a damn champion

Review Text: I am very impressed with this product. My husband and I used it before going to bed after a night of heavy drinking. Normally I would wake up feeling like death, and I feel fine! My husband says it feels like he didn’t drink at all. Also important to note- we did not do a good job of hydrating, and it still worked. I will definitely be purchasing again.

I like that you only have to take 3 of these vs 6 like other products suggest. The minty favor is tolerable and the packaging is nice! I feel that each time I’ve used these (plus drinking water/drinking responsibly) I’ve woken up the next morning feeling less groggy and gross as I would had I not taken Cheers. If you suffer from horrible hangovers like me, it’s worth a shot to try these and see if they work for you. I do agree that you can’t take 8 shots, drink 12 beers and expect these to leave you with zero ramifications the next day. I’ll definitely repurchase and continue to use in the future!
Think of this product as sunscreen except for your brain when drinking.Once you hit north of 40 even a couple of drinks can leave you feeling blah the next day. Thrive really helps.

At first I was skeptical about this product but for $35 I figured why not try it. I’m so glad I did. After one night of drinking a lot more than I should have, I took 2 pills, chugged a bottle of water and went to bed. The next day my energy levels were much higher than usual after a night of heavy drinking and I was actually productive during the day. Of course I didn’t feel 100% (and I know the product doesn’t guarantee that), but I truly noticed a significant difference. I also noticed a drastic improvement in my mood.  Normally the next day I’m anxious, a little sad, and overthinking everything (the whole “get rid of hanxiety” was the reason I bought this product in the first place), but I actually had none of that after using this product. It’s definitely worth a try.

I definitely think this stuff works. This is my second bottle and I’ve recommended it to friends and family. I’m giving it 4 stars because it comes in way over-the-top wasteful packaging and my most recent bottle came with a koozie. It’s nice, but unnecessary, and they could charge less instead of putting so many resources into their packaging and “extras”.

These things really work, even if I only take one or two instead of the recomended amount of 3 I feel a big difference. I have tried other brands but this stuff has a really high concentration of the japanese tree bark that makes the real difference in a hangover. 5 out of 5 stars for sure.

These pills made me feel far worse than when I didn’t take them. I never drink more than 2 glasses of wine (but those 2 glasses can really affect me), so I thought these would just take the edge off the next day. I tried these 3 different times, and my headache and nausea were 10x worse. Have now drank twice without taking them and it’s back to mild hangovers. I don’t know if I’m allergic to something in here but they’re in the garbage.

I tried this for the first time after a few glasses of wine and I slept so much better and did not feelbad the next morning.  I don't drink a lot and when I have a glass of wine or 2 I never feel great the next morning. Cheers definitely worked well.

After 12 hours of St. Patricks day drinking and partying, a buddy of mine told me to take Cheers.  While I was suspect that it would do anything to help me from being hungover on Sunday, I figured it couldn’t hurt.  In previous situations after a long day of drinking, the next day would be shot and a total waste for me.  I woke up the next morning and felt shockingly okay!  While I had some lingering effects from a long day of drinking, overall I felt great and was able to function throughout the day.  I quickly ordered my own bottle and would highly recommend you do as well.

Review Text: I have always struggled with migraines and feeling bad after just a few drinks. With Cheers, i can now enjoy drinking alcohol without feeling bad the next day. This product as incredible! I have low blood sugar so with the wrong choices my mornings could be terrible. This solution really helps! It makes me a little tired but all the other symptoms are gone. This seemed to work better for me than the other products, with way fewer doses needed. I'll definitely keep this in my medicine cabinet.

This stuff truly works!! I have forever suffered from bad hangovers, anxiety and “booze blues” post drinking. So I would always overthink drinking even before I started. I didn’t feel like I usually feel- had a different mindset which is a weird description but if you experience booze blues you know what I’m describing. Using these for those trips forever now!! Review Title: Try it, it worked for me!!!

Review Text: Interesting idea, when you’re hooked up to an IV they inject sodium-glucose to help with rehydration. Cheers brings a product where you can easily enjoy the benefit of helping your body rehydrate and feel better after drinking. I love to safely drink with my friends and family on the weekends and taking Cheers helps me feel better and motivated. I do enjoy this product and will purchase again. My only concern is the packaging being in a glass bottle. I dropped the bottle (I promise not under the influence! Haha) and it shattered. The label kept the bottle intact but there are shards of glass mixed in with the pills. I’ve only used the blue bottle twice and I will not risk it taking any of those, it makes me sad to throw away. Please change the bottle! Drunk people are at risk!
Review Title: Love the product, change the bottle.

Review Text: I was super skeptical, but these work. I took them before going to bed on NYE (was drinking from 4PM-1AM), and felt fairly decent the next morning. I was still a little tired and not 100%, but I was in way better shape than normal-- was able to go on a run and everything! Would totally recommend.

I've used many anti-hangover pills/aids in recently years, since I've started getting real hangovers at the age of 25. Nothing has truly worked like this. I take three before bed after a long night of drinking and wake up feeling like as though no drinking occurred the night before at all.  Even on nights when I've had 7 or 8 strong mixed drinks, I still wake up feeling like I can go about my day feeling normal. This was never the case for me before taking these magical pills. I will never be without this product when drinking EVER again!

These actually helped me fairly well on my cruise. I drank a lot with the drink package and got a little (very) more drunk one night. I popped 3 of these before I went to bed and I woke up not feeling sick (I usually have throwing up hangovers) and I did not have a headache. I was still tired but that was fixed with some espresso. The packaging seems a bit over the top and I feel like I'm probably paying for a lot of cute packaging and glass bottle when all I really want is a product that delivers the promised value. As for the product itself, it does seem to help! It's impossible for someone to know for sure if they feel "at least 50% better" since there are so many factors that go into feeling a hangover, who knows if a less-bad hangover is all because of this. I do think it helps tho and I'll continue to use it. Just wish it was a cheaper.
Review Title: Seems like it does help some

I am constantly taking out clients and traveling and quite often over-imbibe. As I have gotten older it begins to hurt more and more in the AM. The recommendation is three capsules, but we prefer to take four. Usually I would wake up with horrible headache, nausia, low blood pressure and over all just terribly hangover... Review Title: I was very skeptical, but it works

Review Title: Great stuff - does what it is says

Review Text: Okay so first of all, yes they work. I’m not a big drinker so I can’t speak to having more than 3-4 drinks a night and using these, but if I have 2-3 these work like a charm! I am the person who gets debilitating anxiety and migraines after drinking even a small amount. This stuff has helped me so much. Obviously, you still need to monitor your intake but I no longer am confined to my bed for half a day because I have a migraine and weak stomach unable to take any medication.
After a night of drinking pop these and bam! No hangover! This is coming from a bar owner so we know! This is my second bottle purchase!

I don’t know about you, but if I had a hang over and someone said you can pay $100 to be free from suffering- I’d gladly do it.But luckily, these pills are not that expensive. These are the real deal. Went on vacation, partied multiple nights, took them each time, and no hang over. And yes, I’m sure I would have had one if I hadn’t taken these.

So I don’t ever write reviews and I was super hesitant about buying these because of course... if you drink enough, hangovers are imminent. I’ve taken “Flyby” hangover pills before that worked okay but holy crap let me tell you. These pills are a GOD SEND. When I drink more than 2 glasses of wine per night (especially in quarantine) and take these pills before bed I feel amazing the next day. No hangover, no feeling nauseous, nothing. Couldn’t rate these higher. Don’t even hesitate. BUY THEM.
Review Title: I don’t ever write reviews but...

Review Text: It’s entirely possible that it’s a placebo, but it will say I feel much better when taking these after drinking. They’re super expensive, but seem to really work.

I have already recommended this product to all of my friends. From the description I thought it would be too good to be true, but it is actually true. I actually got up and cleaned my apartment worked out and had a day that felt like I hadnt had too many french martinis the night before. I really love this product it is now essential for me!!

Holy crap.  This stuff is the holy grail I have been hoping for most of my adult life.  I get tragic hangovers, and before now had nothing but Advil and Gatorade to help me.  Some hangovers last two days.  Horrible.I drank a few cockrails, a few glasses of wine and a few beers last night with friends.  I took three Thrive+ with a glass of water before bed. This stuff works! My husband rarely drinks anymore, but drank a little too much at a birthday party recently. I made him take 4 capsules and some water before falling asleep that night. He woke up feeling fine! He was surprised and relieved.  I also take these when I drink and feel productive the following day. I plan to pass these out to our friends at our upcoming camping trip!

I’ve taken this 3 times now & shared with my best friend twice. We both haven’t felt any hangover symptoms...no headaches, hot flashes etc. I ordered another bottle with the electrolyte powder drink. Review Title: Thrive is going to be a regular product to add to my weekend regimen

Review Text: If you are looking for the miracle hang over helper..this is for you! Leave it on your nightstand and take right before bed. This stuff works great! I get pretty nasty hangovers, and have tried all the usual remedies. I take three of these before bed and wake up feeling much better, anywhere from 75-100%. I’m on my third bottle and will definitely buy again when I’m out!

Let's not kid ourselves... it's the holidays which leads to family and work stresses which always end in my justifying a glass (hey the bottle is glass) of wine and this product is amazing. Highly suggest to anyone who wants to enjoy but also still gets up again at 4am to do it all over again!
