I was keeping stats for awhile but stopped after the first 5 doses, but roughly after 10 nights of 6+ Claws and 8+ shots I woke up without a hangover 8 times and woke up with a mild hangover twice. 0 times did I experience my usual hangover. I will be buying more forsure. I’ve also gotten one of my friends to buy some and he is also enjoying it.
Review Title: $3 to avoid a hangover is well worth it

Review Text: Now that I’m older I don’t have the alcohol tolerance or day after bounce back that I used to have.  If I don’t take Thrive after having a few drinks- I definitely regret it the next day.  If you know you will be drinking a lot- just put glass of water and the thrive bottle next to your bed- it really works- SO worth it!!

I saw Cheers first as an ad on Instagram. I was able to get a free sample to test it out. Now I swear by this stuff. I take this anytime I drink (I’m a lightweight so I get hangovers easily) and I wake up the next day with no issues. Even when I day drink I’ll take this stuff and I don’t get the dreaded hangover before bed. I love this stuff. I had one more dose before New Years and thankfully this stuff is on amazon so I was able to get a full bottle right after! It doesn’t taste like anything and the pills aren’t too big either. I tell all my friends about these when they complain about their hangovers. So glad I fell across them on Instagram so I don’t have to suffer after drinking anymore!

The first time I took the recommended dose after a long day. I was so sick the next morning, I couldn't get out of bed. I took 1 pill last night after a not so long day and still feel queasy this morning. I'm sure this product works for people, but apparently something in it doesn't agree with me.

This is exactly as advertised, perhaps better. They guarantee a 50% improvement in hangover side effects but I'd say it's closer to 80%. I appreciate the transparency of what's in this stuff as to not think it's just a dietetic.A bit pricey but completely worth the money.
Review Title: This is no joke. A real Hangover Helper.

Review Text: I received this product about a week ago and put it to the test; the instructions stated that you can have a little or a lot, so I decided to try a lot. The results were fairly noticeable, usually after a night of heavy alcohol consumption I cannot function the next day. I felt as if it lowered my symptoms, not exactly "curing" the hangover. I was definitely still hungover. That being said though, i had a mild headache, was slightly fatigued, and I did not feel nauseous at all. Usually I have a very bad headache, very tired, and throw up atleast once. I will enjoy continuing to test this product out. Cheers

For the past few years I've had wicked headaches from red wine. A few of these before bed and no headache and i wake up clear. Thanks, Thrive! I will say that after friends took me out for my birthday and shots were slid my way I probably could have used the drink too. The pills alone that night weren't enough to avoid all pain the next morning, but I shudder to think how bad it would have been. Glad that only happens once a year.

I've used these a few times after a night of later drinks, and the biggest difference i notice is I don't wake up with a headache! Still feel tired or sluggish, but without head pain. Taking 3 big pills can be a pain, and the taste is kind of gross. But overall it's helped the next day for sure

This is my second time buying this product and I will continue to buy it and suggest it to friends. It has been a life saver! After a glass or two of wine, I take one before bed and feel great in the morning. After the occasional big night out with friends, I’ll take two. It is definitely worth it!

The capsules even have a refreshing minty flavor, so they go down easy.I wasn't convinced after the first night, considering it may just be placebo.  However, after three nights of use, I felt better rested, less sluggish, no pounding headache upon waking and my morning mood was noticeably better.  Who doesn't like waking up feeling ready for a coffee and trip to the shanty, instead of a restless day on the couch trying to recover.  IME these helped me get up and out.Only gripe is they are a bit expensive.

I am not usually a heavy drinker, but I've recently lost track of the number of cocktails I've had at the holiday parties.  Taking Thrive+ before I went to bed is the next best thing to not drinking at all.  I have yet to have any ill effects the day after drinking having used Thrive+.  I would highly recommend it.  I'm so excited about it, I'm going to get my next bottle asap for safe keeping!

I really like red wine and these pills allow me to drink a few glasses without feeling like crap the next day. I've found that just 2 pills work well for me and if I drink way too much, I'll pop 3 just to be safe. Most mornings after taking these, I feel just fine. If you do go completely crazy, the hangover will still be there, but these definitely reduce the severity.

I was very happy to discover that these pills do make a difference the next day. I have taken them on vacation where we drink heavily and I can actually get up the next day and can continue to go sightseeing or visit more establishments! Is it a miracle cure? No, but I would say definitely help lessen any hangover effects I normally have.

Does not appear to have any impact after a few glasses of wine.  Nicely packaged and promoted, but still hungover.  I think the only real hangover cure, especially as you get older, is to not drink to excess.  I give up on a silver bullet.
Review Title: Didn't work for me or my wife

Review Text: I LOVE this product. We ordered it in preparation for our New Year’s Eve party. I had a whole bottle of champagne to myself I’m sure. I even went to the gym that day.No nausea no headaches! Highly recommended.

Usually I’ll experience a headache, nausea and just general grogginess but if I take Thrive before bed, the worst I experience the next day is just feeling a little tired from lack of sleep. Definitely my secret weapon if I occasionally overdo it.

I definitely notice a difference in my hangovers when I take this product. I use one capsule for light drinking, or two capsules plus the oral rehydration drink with heavier drinking. If I forget to take it before bed, my hangovers lay me out for the whole next day, even if I drank a lot of water. With this, I notice that I'm not completely useless the next day. Some coffee and an ibuprofen and I can go about my day fairly normal. I've bought several bottles and I just bought another one for my trip to Mexico where we will be doing a lot of drinking. I've tried other products like charcoal and milk thistle, but none work as well as this.

You receive very little product. I’m not usually a drinker, but had one glass of exceptional wine. I took the recommended dosage before bed and I could feel the effects of the wine in the morning. Just take Milk Thistle to protect the liver.

Review Text: My hangovers are usually pretty brutal, but only consist of nausea. I N E V E R throw up, never have, from drinking or a hangover, until I took this. This product claimed that it uses 50% of its packaging from reused and recycled materials, but the amount of useless packaging for the presentation was ridiculous. The following day, I again felt great and had no hangover symptoms.  There are no cons to this product.  The taste is fine and the capsules aren't too big to swallow.  I highly recommend this product to everyone who drinks!

I can’t believe this actually works. Went out out for a friend’s birthday party and drank several drinks and a few shots. Works surprisingly well! I've always had horrific hangovers, but taking Thrive has made all the difference! I gave these away. After taking twice for mild hangovers, they seemed to actually induce a headache for me! A headache I couldn’t get rid of for most of the day. I’ll just stick to ibuprofen before bed and a couple glasses of water the night before on those rare occasions I over indulge.

Review Title: Changed my life as a mid-30's male in a big city

Review Text: I've tried this for a month now and just recently started to really notice the cumulative effects. On nights when I drink, I take a few of these Cheers capsules before bed. I wake a lot easier. My body doesn't feel logey and run-down and I have more energy. Before, on those "day after" mornings, I had no desire to eat or do much of anything. I feel that I have a better appetite and a desire to get up and get out and do things. Thanks for a great product. Will update as I continue to try this method to get me up and at 'em!

I used to suffer from crippling, can’t get it of bed hangovers, since using this I’ve never suffered from those terrible day suckers! You feel like you didn’t drink at all (unless you only had a small amount anyways) but youll be able to make it through your day! Love, love, love Cheers. It makes a huge difference the next day. Sure, if you drink way too much you’ll still be tired, but you won’t have the nausea/headache/dizziness, even after a six glass of wine night (!) You’ll sleep better as well, not just from the positive physical effects but also from knowing you are helping protect your poor lil’ liver! Make sure to drink plenty of water as instructed, and you are golden!

This actually can work. I've tried this multiple times and it has either significantly reduced a possible hangover or prevented one altogether. I get hangovers very easily, even from a few drinks so this is a lifesaver. Something of note is this is not a miracle cure. You can't drink seven different types of alcohol in one  evening or day drink into the night and have zero water and expect this to fix you.  My best practice is take three pills at the end of drinking with one full bottle of water. If you think you'll be too drunk to remember to take them (I've been there) leave the bottle on your pillow! I've really liked how this has worked for me.

Everyone’s body will respond differently, of course, but I have had the best luck with this product for those “mornings after.”  You’ll still be tired, but you will feel significantly less headache-y or sick if you’ve had one too many the night before.  The best solution is to drink in moderation but for those times that some of us don’t, this is a great product to have on hand.

This product is absolutely amazing. ever since turning 25 my hangovers became horrendous. Who knew there was a product for helping hangovers before they even happen! This product and the idea itself is AMAZING. I was sluggish and I could tell I had drank the night before...but given how much I drank and the way I feel, I will be re-ordering more of this.  Now, I would not be drinking excessive knowing that this pill will help me, because I still hate hangovers, but it is nice knowing that two-three capsules and I can literally feel like 95% myself! It does seem to work. When I first got it, I used it often and kinda forgot what impact it had. But then after not using it for a while and being back to hangovers, when I used it again on a night where I had a very good idea of the hangover I'd have based on exactly what I'd had, it was significantly diminished. I mean, that I'd had drink for drink (same brand of beer/wine and same amount) between two nights where the only difference was whether I'd taken these pills and they definitely made things better. If you're always drinking different amounts when you go out, then it can be difficult to compare how much it impacts you the next day. Even just different beers can have radically different impacts on your hangover. So, it wasn't until I'd done a drink-for-drink comparison in roughly the same timeframe that I felt like the results were not just placebo or that any positive differences being misattributed to the pills where it could have actually been "Oh, yeah, I drank 8 beers with 3x the alcohol as the beers I normally drink" on the night I didn't take the pills. I'd recommend you do your own tests, the pills come with a beer coozy, so... why not?

I don't know if any "hangover cure" could have saved me from the level of dehydration I caused myself during that time.. but I had hope. I went to bed pretty early, drank some water and took 4 pills before bed (getting a good amount of sleep usually saves me the next day). The next day I was dead. I definitely vomited multiple times the next day and wasn't able to function until like 6pm. The day after that I got extremely sick- it seemed like a stomach bug, but no fever. I was out for 2 more days with vomiting, diarrhea and severe stomach cramping. I can't conclude that the illness was related to the pills but I definitely thought it was strange or maybe just something was off with my whole digestive tract. I want to try the pills again on a more controlled occasion like a wine night but I am also kind of afraid of the same stomach reaction..Remedies that work best for me are the small vitamin/electrolyte/caffeine drinks so I'll probably just stick with those for the big nights out.

For all those enamoured with the fact this is a Shark Tank product, consider that the panel is overall concerned with one thing ... profit. If a company can get millions of people to buy a product at thirty bucks and even if 90 percent of people never buy it again because it didn't work, thats a lot of profit for essentially powdered plant and gel cap. So what happens after 90% of people figure out it doesn't work? You completely rebrand it, change the name and packaging ... this used to be called Thrive ... and hope to get a lot of those same 90% who tried it the first time.Before I get into my results trying Thrive, or Cheers, or whatever this will be called in a year, let me point out that the folks who came up with this product weren't scientists. They are very good at branding (and apparently rebranding). There is an FDA logo on the marketing. You'd think it was approved as a product by the FDA. In actuality, it was produced in a factory which as a location for manufacturing was approved by the FDA. This says nothing about the actual product. The numerous scientific studies are, from a medical standpoint, flawed. Read McGill University's story on this ... small samples, no blind testing/placebo testing, etc.The company is very good at capturing a younger audience with its instagram ads and podcast sponsorships. Younger audiences are more likely to try a new product based on claims alone and more apt to binge drink and search for a cure to the after effects. It seems like the reviews are mixed here on results. Which makes me wonder how much marketing goes into this phenominon.The plant based chemical which is the star of the show in this product has a pretty bad rate of not being broken down by the body before being able to be effective. Meaning though used in alternative Chinese medicine, on its own in these concrntrations, Japanese Raisin Bush should not be effective.A friend of mine bought this and I decided to give it a go, although I would be a bit nervous about taking a product which affects my liver breakdown, in a bad or good way, on a regular basis. I followed the instructions during a night of drinking red wine and a tequilla shot and woke up with the same headache and upset stomach I usually do. No change at all.Sorry but if you are looking for a hangover cure, making two young dudes tons of money by buying a well marketed product which was featured on a tv show about millionares looking for products that will offer a high return on their investment ... probably won't help your headache. The power of marketing is a scary thing. Witchcraft would probably remove a hangover just as effectively, which is to say not at all.
Review Title: If you believe this works I've got a bridge to sell you

Review Text: I recently was offered a free (actually $1 for shipping) trial of this product to see if I liked it and if it worked. And, since I'm willing to give (almost) anything at least a try once, I went ahead with it. I drank maybe 6-8 shots worth of whiskey and then took three of these pills before bed.And, I have to tell you, overall I was pretty upset soon after. This product contains huge excesses of Thiamine (Vitamin B12), as do many other supplements. Now, what no one seems to realize when they pack in such huge amounts of Thiamine into products like these is that Thiamine has terrible side effects.I couldn't sleep at all! And normally that much whiskey puts me out pretty quickly. Instead, I was restless, getting hot flashes (I'm a guy), irritable, with a weird heart palpitation, and overall unable to sleep! For like two hours!And when I woke up, I had this awful buzz in my head, on par with a typical migraine. Yes, it's true, many of the usual symptoms of my hangovers were gone. But at what cost? I felt nauseous in a /different/ way the entire day. I had a weirdly different sort of headache instead of the normal hangover one. My heart also was racing the entire day.I cannot say I would recommend this product to a friend, as I think these side effects may be more common than people realize. It would have been easy to chock them up to "normal hangover stuff," but my verdict would be to just avoid drinking to excess in the first place. And to, therefore, save pills like this for very rare occasions.
Review Title: Negative effects of some ingredients, deceptive subscription practices

Review Text: I decided to give CHEERS a try because I happened to receive the promo email on a morning when I was nursing a rather gnarly hangover. I’d heard of the product before but mostly shunned it as gimmicky. I felt bad enough that morning I got the promo code email that I said “What the hell have I got to lose by trying this?” I went ahead and got the three products for max discount: Restore - Hydrate - Protect. I live in Houston, so I received my products the very next day. A few days later I had several drinks and thought it would be a good night to try test these out...honestly didn’t think they would do much. I was wrong! After my last drink I toke the 3 Restore capsules and hit the sack. I typically wake up very early, like 4:30-5:00, but I’d had enough to drink the night before I should have felt a bit hungover at least, and also not necessarily feeling drunk, but kinda...if you get my drift. I felt pretty normal and was pleasantly surprised. I went downstairs to get my water and remembered about the Hydrate powder & Protect capsules. I mixed a scoop of HydrAte with a cold glass of water, then drank it down with the two Protect capsules (these are for liver health by the way). About 15 minutes later I felt even better, bright-eyed and very clear, as if I’d not even had a single beer the night before. These worked for me great. The downside is that they are pretty pricey, considering the Restore and Hydrate products are only 12 servings each. I would try to search for promo codes, as I saved like 25% off my total order. Hope that helps

Does not work for me. First off the directions counterdict each other..... serving size is 3 tablets...but the directions say 2-4.  I originally ordered off facebook they had "free" sample just pay shipping. Well they roped me into autoship by giving my credit card for the shipping for the free sample. Review Title: It's a no for me dawg

Review Text: I took these pills for a while and they seemed to help, but I eventually got sick from them. I had such terrible body aches that I had to go to prompt care. I was tested for covid, the flu, and kidney stones and everything came back negative. I missed 2 days of work because the hospital thought I had an unidentifiable virus! I wasn't sure if the pills caused the reaction so I waited until a weekend to try them again and I got sick again! Same reaction, just less severe since I only took 1 pill.

I ordered from their website from an ad on Facebook.  It made you sign up for a subscription.  The pills did not do much the first time I tried, but I only took 2.  I got the 1st subscription bottle and tried this.  I had 3 drinks - which is my limit I stop at because I know anymore I will feel worse.  I took them before bed, still falling within an hour of my last drink though.  Ok up in the middle of the night and starting throwing up.  I was so confused...I did not drink enough to be that sick.  Did not even think about the pills much honestly.  So they sent me my first bottle...which I really did not want as I do t drink that much and do not need a monthly supply.  I did however try this again - twice as directed.  Taking 3 pills and AGAIN got horribly sick to my stomach.  So it had to be the pills.  This never happened after having just 2-4 drinks.  Haven’t used them since and have not had another vomiting episode.  Also you cannot cancel....it’s so hard.  You can’t do it on the website or via email.  You have to call.  I literally had to have my credit card reissued so they would stop charging and I still get emails asking me to update my payment info.  I tried hang zero - much cheaper and I got it in amamzin.  I found this helped a ton ( I just get a bit of a headache and yucky feeling the next day). But woke up feeling pretty normal after using the hang zero.  Just don’t!

The sensitivity to light was reduced a little and my overall sluggishness was reduced for the first couple hours of waking up. This product has great packaging and great team (from what I've seen) but the product itself leaves a lot of room for improvement. I currently take sleep walkers after my night of drinking and I was looking for other pills. This will not be my pill. For those 5 star reviews surely this is the only pill theyve tried and have nothing else to base it off of. That's like giving someone who's never har sugar a stick of gum. Its great until you try any other gum. This is that pill, so ok for first pill but try others for your own sake.
Review Title: Bought on their website and doubt they'll post my review.

Review Text: This product does help your body process alcohol faster. The first night I used it, I texted all my friends the next day to brag about how not hungover I was. The second time, I woke up with a very swollen tongue. Like it didn't fit in my mouth, very very weird. I did not think it was the pills, chalked it up to just having eaten something too spicy (although this had never happened before).A week later I tried again and had three pills instead of two, my tongue was huge in the morning and that's when I made the connection. It had to be the thrive pills. I was fine by the next day.Well, last night I was at a neighborhood party and drank too much and said I'll just take one to help a bit... Even one did it. Swollen again. They're going in the trash I guess :( I am not allergic to anything as far as I know so this is really strange to me.

When I first tried these, I expected to be disappointed and roll my eyes at yet another supplement promising to do magical things. Well, magic I asked for and magic I got!I took this after a wedding with open-bar, and I was the only one of my friends bouncing around the next day as if no drinking happened the night before. No stomach aches, no fever, dehydration, headache, or any of the usual symptoms. I didn't tell my friends I took this and they were wondering why I was the only one who didn't look or act the slightest bit hungover.I've also tried taking this when it was too late and the effects of a hangover were already there. It eliminated most of them rather quickly and I only felt the occasional symptom every few hours.To me, not losing an entire day of productivity to feeling like crap to make up for a fun night before makes this WELL WORTH IT.

At first, I was hugely skeptical about this pills. There is so many on the internet that claim to stop hang overs so naturally I wasn't buying these with huge expectations. After a night of drinking at my Bachelorette Party, we all took these to hopefully help our hang overs the next day since we had a million wedding things to do. WOW! These did an amazing job! 4/5 of us almost had no hang over. The 5th still had some hang over symptoms but nothing unbearable. Now I have these stocked in the house for parties or any nights of drinking! Sadly, I am not 21 any more and need all the help I can get to recover the next day! Buy them! Try them for sure!

I should preface this review by saying I first received this through their publicly available trial. When I first tried this, I did not drink too much and it did seem to work. I could not really tell since I did not remotely go overboard.  I then decided it was not meant for me. Well, with all auto renewal subscriptions I forgot and I was charged for a full bottle. With their guarantee, I decided it was worth it to give it a further go. I did have a few times where it was a possibility that I could drink further than before and not have to deal with any major consequences, so I proceeded to do just that. Upon using this product, I woke up feeling about 70% better than I normally would for the first time around. No headache, no stomach issues, and sleep was fine. Upon contingent use, the effects were reproduced again, and again, and again. Eventually I ended up drink around 400 - 500ml of whiskey, and upon taking this I woke up feeling around 50-60% normal. Normally, that would cause me a long lasting stomach age that would give way to vomiting and a headache that would last at least 6 hours. Upon waking I had some slight queasiness and a slight headache as if I had drank 200ml and did not take this. After that experience I am convinced this works, and it works exactly as promised. I can confidently say there is a very strong possibility you will feel 50% better taking this before you sleep or right after your last drink. It is a bit pricey, but even if you drink 2 times per week it does last. I have not purchased another bottle for 1 month, I still can go 4-5 more sessions. The real cost is around $18/mo., so give the trial a go. If you drink every week like I do, this is a must have. I do not know how this works, but I can say it definitely does, and for a supplement that is saying something. If there is one thing to go on here, it's that this does seem to contain peppermint, and does contain ginger. Both have been proven to help alleviate stomach issues, so it at least helps with that.

I combined this with the Thrive+ powder. For review purposes, I purposely drank in excess, and went to bed 5 hours before my scheduled wake-up. I took three pills and a bottle of water mixed with the powder. I woke up to my alarm, got up, peed, snoozed, and woke up an hour later. Oops. However, I am not hurting. There is no headache, no feeling of guilt, no remorse, no lightheadedness. However, something DOES feel off, but in a different way. However, since I am fully functional physical, I would call these pills a winner. I'd like to see what happens taking less pills and various combinations of the powder. Last night is about as hard as I do it and they worked.Edit: After a few more days' use, I have upped the rating to 5 stars. I believe my initial problem was that simply took too many pills and the powder. Just taking two pills was enough to wake up feeling great after 4 beers, 3 drinks, and only 5 hours of sleep.
Review Title: I'd like to see what happens taking less pills and various ...

Review Text: I am not an alcoholic however, I enjoy drinking socially or with my husband.  I purchased these to have on hand during a girls weekend.  I’m a healthy 39 year old.  I have several beers at a pace of one every hour throughout the day and drank plenty of water AND ate meals.  I was not intoxicated but thought that it would be fitting to take the recommended dose right after my last beer and go to bed.  I have done this many times and know my body.  About 10-15 minutes later, I was on the toilet with diarrhea and it felt like someone punched me in the stomach.  I then threw up 3x.  No, it wasn’t the food I ate.  No one else was sick from eating the same thing.  I was absolutely miserable for hours.  And on the toilet with butt water every 20 minutes.  Was NOT pleased.  And was even more exhausted from not sleeping the next morning.

Cheers have an almost minty taste which is helpful when you aren't feeling the best. I tried these before bed and a few times the next day. While I do think that it helped the best if you take the night before, if you forget you can get some mild relief the next day as well. I usually get the blues after a night of drinking, but these made me feel better. I still felt slightly hungover, but more tired than nauseous or headaches. Like other reviewers I wish there were more in the bottle, but the packaging is very nice and thoughtful. Overall I liked this product and would order again
Review Title: These def take the edge off

Review Text: I purchased this product after a facebook promotion and they auto-enrolled me in a rolling prescription for $30/month. Luckily I paid with paypal and could cancel the subscription through my account there. Now I'm getting emails every other day requesting I update my credit card information.It's basically a bunch of B vitamins that your body can't absorb (you can tell by the color of your urine within a couple hours) so cool $3 pee!  Maybe I felt less anxious, but I definitely still had a major headache. The label is also printed with cheap ink that bleeds and there's no way to actually read it. I think a multi vitamin and an energy drink with b vitamins would do the same trick, and without subscriptions.
Review Title: Purchased through website that doesn't offer reviews-this is a scam

Review Text: I've been using Cheers after drinking for a few weeks now and noticed my mornings were generally better for it. I'm not a heavy drinker, and the Cheers definitely helped anyway. It's the little things that count, right?WELL THEN this past Friday night I had a wild and crazy night. The kind of night where your friends keep the shots coming. Before I could blink, I'd had 3 shots, 3 whiskeys, and 3 cocktails. That's 18 ounces of pure spirits. Oops. My entire group was so ossified (drunk, but more fun) that we forgot where we were for a solid 15 minutes.I was certain my morning would be a %&#ing nightmare. But stumbling into my house (I used Lyft 😉), I had the wherewithal to take Cheers before bed.And voila! Oh my god. I was definitely affected by the alcohol, but I was spared the insane hangover I expected. If I HADN'T had Cheers, I would have been in bed all day. I know this because my friends (who didn't have Cheers!) told me they couldn't even stand up straight until 5pm.I was able to get up relatively early, rehydrate, and eat a normal breakfast. No hangover food or hair of the dog for me. Cheers saved my day.
Review Title: Saves the Day | Why My Friends Wish They Were Me

Review Text: Overall, a really great product!  I started getting insane anxiety the day after heavy drinking and even after cutting back, I found that this anxiety still lingered, making the next day nearly unbearable.  This eventually culminated into a severe panic attack after one particular night of drinking and it made me seriously consider never drinking again.  I found an add for this product on my Facebook and thought I'd give it a try.  It helped with my day-after anxiety immensely!  The only thing I'd say is that it's a bit pricey, so you have to choose wisely on which big night out you use it.  They could possibly scale back on the fancy packaging to bring down the price; however, I understand the importance of this company's desire to provide a high quality product to their customers.

My bf and I don’t drink often because after our 30’s hit we felt it way more and saw the weight add on haha. When we do drink now we always take cheers! It has helped over come the 2 day hang overs and also made it much easier to function the day after a fun night out with friends. The only issue we have found is that the pills give people extreme heartburn. I recommend taking  3 cheers pills and then 2-3 tums before bed. You legit feel so much better and as if you can go workout the next day! They are the best hangover relief remedies I’ve ever tried
Review Title: Best hangover help..... beware of heartburn

Review Text: For some reason, the holidays brings out my over consumption tendencies!  It’s usually Christmas Eve that I over indulge, and then I feel terrible on Christmas Day!  But some of us never learn, so this year I had backup... Took 3 Cheers before bed, and by morning I was able to function without feeling horrible. Of course I was a little slow to get moving, but this helped a LOT.

Here is my review after my first use....went to a bachelorette party last night and I just got out of yoga class.  That in an of itself is amazing when I should be terribly hungover. I'm 48 and have had pretty bad hangovers for years.  So much so that I skip drinking often bc of how it ruins my next day - esp the early part.  I felt good this am - not amazing but so much better than expected! I did dishes and felt pretty darn good for drinking from 5pm-1am and having had a good brew pub beer, then two large coconut rum, fruity, sweet drinks followed by a very strong jack and coke that was probably a triple. That's enough sugar and booze to hang me over usually.  So glad I watched Shark Tank! This could be life changing stuff!

It very obviously helps my body to recover after drinking. Obviously a bottle of tequila isn't going to be solved by anything, but this helps me feel better, feel better quicker, or both... but I absolutely notice a difference in recovery speed, or just feeling like normal. Either way, totally worth it!
Review Title: I use this stuff every time I drink

Review Text: I was skeptical about this. But thought what the hell and got a bottle anyways. I love my football, bourbon, miller lite, and Saturday nights with friends.This doesn't completely take away a hangover if you have a bad one. IT DOES GREATLY REDUCE A HANGOVER. When I use it, I may still wake up a little groggy and tired, but the main effects aren't as bad, or aren't there at all.Anyone claiming that this product does nothing, simply don't have drinks often enough to know the difference. Yes, that makes me sound like and alcoholic, although I am not, it is the truth. If you drink once a month or every couple of months, don't worry about this product. If summer or football season is approaching and you are going to have a drink in your hand, you should definitely have a bottle of Cheers in the other at the end of the evening!
Review Title: This stuff does actually work and I love it.

Review Text: I’m the type who gets so sick after drinking... can’t sleep, anxiety, appetite loss and just generally fkd up. I’ve tried a bunch of “remedies” and just said to hell with drinking, but lmao, doesn’t happen. I tried these pills and woke up feeling great after a night full of drinks! I don’t write reviews, but if you tend to enjoy a drink like I do and have regrets during the sober up, these pills were made for us! Dead serious! Cheers, literally 😅

This product contains magnesium stearate and it still has not been determined if that is a harmless additive, especially if you are taking it in other supplements as well.  Read some scientific studies about it.  Also looks like there is artificial color?  There are other cheaper liver supplements that contain milk thistle and cystenie without these additives.  You can also buy organic milk thistle supplement by itself.  Think twice about what you are putting in your body!!  Many people are getting rich from selling supplements that are not as good for you as you think.

So i've been using this product for a couple years now and swear by it. I cant recommend this enough. hangovers are caused by a variety of things, but the two main factors are dehydration and acetaldehyde buildup (acetaldehyde is a metabolite of alcohol and is basically poison ). cheers (thrive) helps your body clear that acetaldehyde and alcohol. interestingly enough, there are a couple studies on pubmed about the main ingredients. check it out. People think these pills are an end all, but forget the dehydration part. another factor is consider your size/weight, 3 pills recommended for an average sized person drinking a moderate amount. if youre taking beers and shots to pound town all night and youre 6'3" 200lbs, three pills aint gonna cut it. if im going out for a heavy night of drinking my regimen is 3 pills towards the end of the night with pedialyte, then two more right before i knock out. water by bedside throughout the night, wake up feeling 90% better than i would have without cheers.

No, of course it's not a miracle but it's close. My number one tip is if at first it doesn't seem to work take an extra tablet or two. For me taking 4-6 tablets made all the difference. (not actual medical advice, just advice from someone who uses this product)I love this product and am so glad I found it. It really makes all the difference and helps me feel like a functioning adult the day after having a bit too much. Sometimes it eliminates the after effects completely.I don't mind the price at all, it's $3 for the recommended dose which is less than the extra cup of coffee I'd need if I felt hungover.

I have been using Cheers for almost a year now. Whenever I drink alcohol I always take two capsules before bed. I notice a HUGE difference in how I feel the next day. I have forgotten to take it once or twice since I started using it and woke up the next day like WHYY!???It has seriously been such a game changer for me. I also feel much more assured that my liver health is protected. It's not like I drink like I did in college, but as I get older I have started to care more about taking care of my body and my health. I never feel hungover or groggy the next day if I take Cheers (again, it's not like I'm getting wasted) but by taking Cheers whenever I've had some wine the night before, I can wake up the next day feeling like I didn't drink anything.

I did the free trial and this product is NOT effective. I took it as directed (3 capsules before bed) and woke up with the same hangover I've had in previous instances after a night of drinking. I also still had to take ibuprofen later in the day to feel even slightly better.The marketing and packaging of this product is strategic and targets the appropriate audience, but does not hold true to it's promise of alleviating a "hangover".

This stuff is the real deal. I just received my first order this last week a couple days after placing the order.  Now,  I like to drink as much or more as the next guy but hangovers have been getting worse and worse over the years.  I ordered this product and was a bit skeptical.  The day I got it I drank 8-16 oz pbr's. Usually anymore than a 6 pack and I feel like crap the whole next day. I took 3 capsules before bed and woke up the next morning feeling like I hadn't drank anything at all.  I was way stoked, but still not 100% sure of the product.  Last night I went to a bonfire and drank 12-14 pbr's and was up until approx 2 am. I took 3 capsules before bed as and woke up this morning with just a slight hangover. But no head ache, no nausea, and no brain fog.  This stuff delivers.  It may not entirely prevent a hangover but it reduces the negative effects a ton. I will definitely be ordering more in the future, not just for me but friends and family as well.

Absolutely without a doubt worth the $3 per hangover. Buy this.For reference, I’m a 42 year old woman, 5’6”, 135 lbs. I rarely drink during the week, but do drink on weekends. I’ve used it 3 times. Lightest was half a bottle of wine with dinner (resulting in better sleep and zero hangover effects when I woke up). Worst was day drinking spiked seltzer in the sun followed by a party until 2am (Yikes, not sure what was consumed) - result was waking without a headache or nausea at 8 am, and didn’t want/need a nap. I was a bit slower than normal, but SO. MUCH. better than I should have felt. I’d compare it to what I’d normally feel like after 2 glasses of wine.

This is first and probably last review I will ever write. I read reviews, I don’t write them. But I’m writing this one cause this product is amazing.I usually get the worst hangovers every time I drink. Like full next day wasted, in bed, yaking, headache, all of it. I got the sample bottle from cheers which is 3 doses if you take 4 pills. So 12 pills total. I drank a bunch of alcohol literally just to test these out last night. I took 4 right after my last drink at like 4am just like they say to do. I am writing to you this morning after getting about 6 hours of sleep not hungover at all! I feel great. Got up right away, no hangover, no nauseous feeling, no nothing. Its amazing.I will not be able to drink anymore without making sure I have 4 of these right by my side the whole way through. Worth every penny and then some. Definitely buy some.

Got a subscription for these.  Tried multiple times and they don’t work plus they are enormous pills and you have to take a ton of them as per the instructions.  Try liquid IV instead, that seems to work much better.

So I bought this being very skeptical but with a free trial- I figured what's to lose. I used the free trial and still was not able to determine if it helped- but I forgot to cancel and so they sent me my next shipment. I kept taking it and still skeptical- wasn't sure how much good it was doing but took it faithfully each time I drank. Well, this weekend I actually forgot them at home when I went out of town. I drank my normal amount and woke up the next morning with the worst hangover. I actually threw up twice, felt terrible all day, and suffered the full effect of my hangover. It took me experiencing the true extent of my hangovers to realize how bad they are and how much of a difference this product makes. I will definitely be ordered more when I get low.
Review Title: Does The Job is says it does

Review Text: I signed up for a $1 sample and they charged me for another $32 bottle before i even got to try the product. once i finally did try it, I had the worst hangover that literally woke me up at 7 am and i couldn't fall back to sleep till 11. My stomach hurt for a week after that still doesn't feel right another week later... I planned ahead and was decently hydrated before drinking and have definitely drank more in the past without feeling nearly as bad. AVOID LIKE THE PLAGUE! or coronavirus at this point

I haven't used this yet but have heard from 2 different sources that yes they did feel so much better and trust me my acquaintances including myself without any shame were very heavy drinkers before the whole lock down because of Covid 19 but now even worse!!! Hey at least I'm honest and it kind of sucks that the minute you wake up, the first thing you do is make another drink to avoid the hangover but it can't just keep going on forever and then when you finally do stop MAN!!! the hangover is 100 times worse and last for at least 2 days if not more. However according to my drinking comrades the continued drinking to avoid the hangover was no longer needed! Can't wait to try

First saw this on my IG feed with a free sample link. Got an email saying I had been enrolled in auto-renewel, and found out the only way to cancel this is by calling them...As for the pill I took directly as prescribed, I'm a 230 lb male, had 8 beers over the course of 3 1/2 hours, got home ate some food, then took 4 Cheers pills with a big glass of water. And it did absolutely nothing, I woke up 4 hours later with a pounding headache and the bubble guts. This stuff is flour inside a clear capsule as far as I'm concerned.
Review Title: Don't fall for their cool ads and nice packaging...

Review Text: It actually works! I saw this on Shark Tank and was a bit skeptical, but figured that for the price, it was worth a try. I mostly drink wine and tend to get "the spins" or a pounding headache the next morning. After a night out, I could already feel a headache starting to come on, so I took three pills and went to bed. By the morning I felt absolutely back to normal. Amazing product! Will definitely be purchasing again! Great gift idea for the holidays as well.

I didn't order from Amazon, purchased directly from the company website.  I have the same sentiments as many of the other negative reviews - didn't seem to work at all.  I did a comparison several times taking it after drinking vs. not taking it, almost every time I felt worse than when I did not take it.  Also, the lemon thing they put in the jar is kind of off putting and either that or the capsule gave me heart burn the next day.

I love this product don't get me wrong. I strongly dislike the company for shadily charging me $70 to auto renew something I never asked for. I'm currently in the negatives in my bank account and I'm a poor college student. Great idea that actually works but I wouldn't bother with the trouble of possibly having them charge you an absurd amount of money without any confirmation.

This stuff absolutely works.  I have tried several different things. I have used this 2 times. I like to drink. The first time I used it I went out with buddies and we did the whole shot thing and a mountain of beer. I'm 5'6 185 pounds. Probably had about 13 drinks in a 6 hour span in my estimation. I took Cheers before I went to bed. Woke up the next morning and was tired but felt GREAT and had a very positive mindset. Drank again a week later. 8 drinks over 8 hours. Shut it down at 10 pm took the Cheers. Went to sleep at midnight roughly. Woke up at 7 am and I was in a great mood! Ready to go!  I'm in sales and generally when I drink even 4 beers I don't feel like doing much even on Monday. Today is Sunday and I feel like I could run through a brick wall right now lol It WORKS! Btw I'm 39 years old. Hank Williams was correct when he said "the hangovers hurt more than they used to." Not anymore. Thank you Cheers.

I saw this product through Shark Tank and like the rest of you, I didn’t believe for a second it would work. So, I went to the reviews on Amazon and everyone was saying that they had three drinks and felt fine the next day.Let me tell you my story. I bought the sample through their website (about 10 pills, came with a coaster). I decided that I had to actually test it. 6 shots (in roughly 45 minutes) and a few drinks at the club later, I remember nothing of the night but I do remember throwing up and taking these pills before falling asleep.The next morning I woke up with no symptoms but fatigue from the 3 hours of sleep the night before. No headache, no nausea, nothing.I will test Cheers again.Disclaimer:I did not buy this product through Amazon and actually went through their website. Very helpful customer service.
Review Title: Not sure if it was a fluke or not?!?

Review Text: I have to take a double dose of this (6 capsules) as taking 3 does nothing for me. But if I take 6 it works like a charm. I feel mildly tired the next day but no waking up at 4am with my heart pounding, no nausea, little or no headache, and much more energy. I have not tried their oral rehydrating solution and maybe with that I might feel even better. I wish it was a little less expensive as $1 per capsule seems VERY steep to me. But, I do keep on buying it because hangovers are horrible.

I signed up for the trial size on their site. Before I was able to try them, the auto-refill filled. (I wasn't even sure when that would be coming). I'm out 80$ now since the only way to contact them is through the phone. Very disappointed in this company for stealing money from consumers for pills that don't even work.

I have been taking cheers since it was called thrive. It used to be non-flavored then it was lemon flavored and now it is mint flavored. Whatever they did recently to the packaging makes it taste absolutely disgusting. There is some kind of weird plastic film instead of the peel off wrapper. It smells like chemicals and I don't like it at all. I'm really disappointed with these changes and honestly I don't even want to take the pills because they smell so disgusting. Why did they change a good thing?

Dislike price and misleading claims. A study of the ingredients will show tiny amounts of NAC. you can go to a drugstore and buy 600 mg capsules, or Amazon for 900 mg. Both less than $10 and both having much more of the active ingredient: NAC. The powder to mix and drink is only a high sodium and potassium drink; tastes good but Gatorade is cheaper.Better off going to Walgreens, etc.
Review Title: Inadequate, poorly thought out idea with insufficient concentrations.

Review Text: The morning after a night out with my friends I was feeling miserable and this product popped up on my feed. I thought what’s the worst that could happen if I bought it? Maybe it’d work and I’d feel better or maybe it wouldn’t. Well boy was that the best $30 I ever spent. I used it for the first time this past weekend and woke up feeling better than I ever had. I was a little groggy at first but within the hour it felt as if I hadn’t even drank. This is by far the best product I have used when it comes to hangovers and it’s not even close. I would highly recommend this to anyone who’s looking to feel brand new after a night of drinking!

This is the first company that I've come across that makes you call to cancel the trial. It's not 1993 anymore. Ive seen this trend before.The packaging is nice though

I have been using Cheers (formerly Thrive) for about a year now. I always keep a bottle in my medicine cabinet in case I over do it andI  try to take one when I am traveling if I know I am going to be having more than 4 drinks. It's critical if you have a work event or just work in general the next day.Here's what i've noticed in my extensive testing (using red wine as the subject):1-2  glasses - rarely a need for any after alcohol aid2-3 glasses - feels like you didn't drink the night before3-4 glasses - feels like you might have had a drink, but can't be sure4+ glasses - its red wine so you likely won't be feeling 100% but you will be manageable and be able to tackle your day as planned2+ bottles - skip thrive and go to the hospital!In summary, try it out.

Went to Cleveland a few weeks ago and purchased this before hand having seen the advertisements on facebook, figured id give it a shot.  First night i really tied one off the ages, were talking beer, stoli shots, maybe a margy in the mix but atleast 15 beverage night. popped the recommended dosage before passing out with a cold hotel sink glass of tap water.  Woke up with splitting headache but it didnt last long, stomach felt 100% tho. Ive taken since after less heavy drinking nights and felt a ok!

Umm, how!? I've tried several products and recommendations for both preventing and curing a hangover, especially now that I'm in my 30's.  THIS ONE ACTUALLY WORKS. It's great and I've bought several bottles so far. Once, I even forgot to take it the night before and wasn't feeling well the next AM and I took it then and it still made me feel much better. My main problem with hangovers is nausea and I'm miserable with it. When I take these as directed I don't have any issues the next morning. I'll definitely continue to buy and would 5/5 recommend.

I don't feel like this product worked very well - I still didn't feel good in the morning. My friend though, swears by it - so who knows. I am annoyed that you have to call the company to cancel the subscription. I did it but I kept forgetting and so ended up with a lot more than I needed. ALSO they give you like 12 pills in a bottle and you have to take 3 at a time - why not just condense it into 1 pill?  Why do you have to take 3 of the same thing?  Weird. Don't bother - just eat and drink water instead.

An absolute waste of money. Took as directed had 4 drinks. Next day hangover was terrible! The company also has bad customer service and enrolled me in auto subscription without my permission then made me pay for return shipping on their mistake after I said I didn’t want it. Avoid!
Review Title: Avoid! Does NOT work. Bad customer service.

Review Text: Didn't help in hydration or anxiety issues next day. Tried 3 times now, drinking minor amount to more amount of alcohol each time. Failed each time. Still extremely dehydrated, hung over and depressed next day. The pills seem worthless and the hydration powder drink is disgusting. I really wanted this to work. But i notice no difference at all.

This did not work at all. I had a few drinks in the afternoon/early evening, stopped drinking around 9pm. I continued my night and got home around 1:30pm. I followed the directions: took four pills (which is kind of a lot) and drank a huge glass of water. When I woke up, I felt like crap. I am not sure what I was expecting to feel like, but this was definitely a let down.

This is a serious game changer.  Take 3 to 4 and feel great the next day. You just have to remember to take them!  Saves your day the day after a few too many.  Worth it!  The only thing that ever worked for me.

I'm thinking if someone is looking online for hangover treatment they have a problem...the solution for hangover is to drink less.  That 'treatment' not only doesn't cost you anything, it saves you money!

My husband and I ordered the $1 trial 4 doses (12pills) and tried 2 doses ( 3 pills each) after a night of drinking. I was still tired the next day, slight headache which two Tylenol took care of but I had energy and was able to function all day! Well somehow we ended up with 5 pills before we went on a 4-day/3-night trip to Vegas and wasn't able to get a new bottle on time so we just took one pill each every night except the last night we only had one pill left and had to draw straws for it. The pills did their job! Had a great time and not once did I have that horrible 2 day to recover hangover. I have recommended to everyone I know!

It seems like once I hit middle age, it only took a couple adult beverages to make me wake up in the middle of the night, my mind racing and struggling to get back to sleep. Cheers Restore has been a game changer in helping me stay asleep so I get a good night's rest and wake up feeling better the day after having some drinks. Thank you, Cheers!
I am happy to have found this product.  Good to have on hand if you happen to indulge a bit more than you should.  Easy to take, customize it to how many capsules you think you need.  Awesome!

Terrible! Gave me migraines every time I took it.  The company is very sneaky too, they promise a sample size for the cost of shipping...but they don't tell you you are signing up for a monthly subscription that they auto charge your card for.  Then they make it hard to cancel.  Bad product even worse company! They just released a study showing the hangover prevention supplements are unlikely to work anyway.  Please save your money!
Review Title: Terrible! Gave me migraines every time I took it.

Review Text: I tried this once, it didn’t really help. I canceled my subscription with them.. Due to it not working, and me quitting my drinking problem... they still sent me another shipment and charged me.. what Is a recovering alcoholic suppose to do with these??? You guys are scams, expensive and crap.

Dudddddeeeee! They work just like they advertise to! I tried them two back to back nights. Both nights I had a mixture of beer and wine/liquor. I am not the person to be able to handle this before without any sort of hangover! I would be hanging the next day ALL day for sure but with 3 capsules before bed and a large glass of water I feel COMPLETELY fine today. Highly recommend party people! Don’t go anywhere without them! Little pricy, but hey what’s a nasty hangover prevention worth to ya? Get em now!

Our house takes 3 pills after a drink (or 2, or 3), and we've noticed a substantial difference upon waking up the next morning. No more headaches. No more feeling slow and tired. We wake up feeling energized and great! Highly recommend--can definitely feel the difference in my body!

I do not normally write reviews on products, even ones as bad as this product. However, I am writing this at work with the worst hangover of my life. I have tried this product multiple times now following the directions perfectly.... Saw absolutely no changes in the post drinking next day side effects. I am a responsible drinker, only have a few, don't mix alcohol types so if it should work for anyone it should be me. My partner has tried them several times too and saw no change. I think that the other positive reviews are definitely a scam. Do not buy these.

I usually just take one or 2 pills.  I can have a hangover from 2 glasses of wine and just feel horrible and nauseated.  Took my  last pill a couple of days ago after a afternoon and night of drinking beer...  I had 1 last pill and took it before bed. I was tired the next day and no energy (probably been better with 2+ pills), but I got out of bed, I had no headache and better yet, not nauseated.  For me, not a 100% cure, but better than covered up in bed and throwing up.  I won't be without these pills after any amount of drinking, be it 2 glasses of wine or 7 or so beers.  I tell all my friends about these pills.  They are pricey and it isn't a miracle pill, but they do help and I guess since I am buying more, worth the $$. (wish I had these YEARS ago)

I used this product once so far and had great results. I had none of my normal symptoms of a hangover, like headache or nausea. I still felt fatigued like I drank the night before, but it took away my worst symptoms.

I wouldn't say that cheers completely prevents a hangover, but it does significantly reduce the effects of a hangover. With that being said, I highly recommend it to all my friends and family who like to wind down with some fine alcohol. The capsules also freshen up your mouth a bit with the minty flavor, in case you forget to brush your teeth after having an extra drink.
Review Title: Did I really drink last night?

Review Title: Good product from a good company

Review Text: I have tried many different hangover pills looking for the best! Unfortunately this wasn't it. I didn't have a hangover the next day but I felt VERY groggy all day then by the end of the day fog brain. I will stick with the best (PartyPal Pills).

After an evening of drinking, I use Cheers Restore and Cheers Hydrate together, before I go to bed. It really works! I may feel a little sluggish when I first wake up, but there is no headache, dizziness or nausea. These 2 products work so effectively together. Worth every penny!

Unfortunately I have never felt worse, I did not even have a proper night lut, so thought it would be a perfect time to try. I woke up in the middle of the night with the worst headache I have ever had in my life and was nauseous twice. I have not been nauseous from drinking for 18 years and in no way should I have been nauseous from  what i drank. I thought maybe food poisoning but my friend who decided not to take them felt fine and we ate the same thing.. maybe a fluke, but am not risking taking it again..

This is a good product.  I was rather skeptical at first but after a night out I have nothing to lose by giving it a try.  Surprised by morning it was helpful in reducing the alcohol effects, but there's no replacement for sleep.  The recommended chaser Cheers Ors is awesome,  take the pills and the chaser and able to function the next day!

Had to work early one Saturday morning, knowing I was going out on Friday night, so I thought this would be the perfect time to try these out! Just a great product can I just say first how good these smell and taste! They also work so well!! I’ve been getting bad hangovers even if I don’t drink very much and these have saved me now multiple times from getting a hangover!!

Was in Cancun for my buddies' wedding this past week. All-inclusive so basically drinking from breakfast to midnight. He sold pretty high on these Cheers pills so I figured why not? Went ham on the first day and just assumed I was going to be in for a rude awakening in the morning. Took 3 that night and actually woke up feeling fine. Like.. i'm saying not 50% better, not 75% better.. like I didn't drink at all. I was shocked. Ironically days 3-5 varied. I had a pretty bad headache on the third day. Liquid IV and a workout helped even that one out. I woke up feeling pretty decent the fourth day. Like I knew I had drank too much but wasn't all foggy in my head. Last day was a wash because we had an early flight out. Couldn't tell if I was hungover or just super tired. Either way -- I think this is to be expected. It varies on how you will feel based on how many you throwback. In my book - If I'm about to go on a trip with a lot of drinking it totally makes sense to buy these and try them out. Feeling marginally better is a win in my book compared to just feeling crappy. The ONLY reason I gave this 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the price. Per serving it was a little steep. Again -- justified since I knew we would be going hard in the paint on this trip -- but there appears to be a couple of cheaper options out there that MAY work as well. As for me, I'll buy these every time. Highly recommended.
Review Title: I mean... this stuff is pretty good

Review Text: It's like a little miracle pill! Being a bartender you think you know all of the tricks to curing or preventing a hangover, but they still happen and you can just never really plan how the night is going to go. What a night I had last night and I took 3 Cheers with a glass of water as soon as I got home and went to bed less than an hour later. I woke up this morning actually feeling pretty decent. No throbbing headache and no feeling nauseous. I still felt like I had been drinking but I was able to get out of bed and go to work. The pills come in a thick glass jar and is packaged in a way that there is no chance of the jar breaking during delivery. I honestly have nothing bad to say about this product! I give you my recommendation of Cheers!

I've tried so many different things like Liquid IV before bed or those other pills but none have worked as great at these.Hang overs have been hitting so much harder as you age. I'm practically on my death bed the next day swearing I'm never drinking again. I've been only drinking like once a month now... but my friend gave me this to drink before bed and we were way past 10 shots. I woke up the next day like I basically didn't drink and I semi blacked out that night too which would have meant 2 days of recovery for me.This stuff is amazing. I'm already on my second bottle cause I've been sharing with my friends and they've all picked it up. its easy to just take it right before bed or after my last drink.The only con is this allows me to drink more often now because there's no hang over.... could be a good thing for some of y'all.
Review Title: I can still party like I'm 21.

Review Text: These have changed my life! I am unfortunately one of those people that could not have more than one drink without being hungover the next day. I would be hungover to the point of not being able to function for 24 hours at least. I am not a huge drinker, but every once in awhile when I go out for a special occasion, I like to have a few drinks. Since I found these, I have yet to have a terrible hangover. I was skeptical when I first purchased them, but I can attest to their effectiveness. I might wake up in the morning not feeling great, but it is absolutely nothing compared to what it would have been if I did not take them. One night I had 5 drinks which would have put me in bed for the next 48 hours, but I woke up only feeling a little groggy and headachy and that's all! I don't know how they work, but they do, and I'm so thankful I found these!
Review Title: Have not had a hangover since I found these!

Review Text: There's not much to say other than it really does work. If you drink a lot and then take this after your last drink and go to bed and wake up your effects are definitely reduced. I had my friend try them and he also had positive experience. I'm not really heavy drinker but I do get headaches sometimes from those sugary mixed drinks and this has helped on the special occasion that I do drink a little harder.

This is such a great product to always have on hand! I spent a long weekend with a bunch of friends, and really put Cheers to the test.To my surprise, I had a action packed weekend, and loved every minute of it. I took it as directed, and experienced no negative effects, when I normally would’ve for sure.Needless to say, I will always keep a bottle handy to protect myself while having fun.
Review Title: Put it to the Test and it Worked Great!

Review Text: I was skeptical, but thought I would give it a try anyway and WOW!!!  I woke up this morning and have absolutely NO hangover symptoms, not even a headache. I normally wake up still super tired, sluggish, slightly dizzy and sometimes my stomach is a little woozy. I don’t drink crazy amounts to the point of passing out... but I drink quite a bit when I do drink on the weekends. This will now be kept stocked at all times in my house and recommended to all my friends and family.
Review Title: Can’t beleive this REALLY works...but it does.

Review Text: Even though I read all the great reviews for Cheers Restore, I was still a bit skeptical. Not any more! I put it to the test this weekend and woke up pleasantly surprised. For starters, I was pleasantly surprised that I had slept all night instead of walking up at 4 am with dry mouth and a terrible headache. Instead, I was pleasantly surprised to sleep until 8 am and wake up feeling clear-headed and headache free. I am definitely a believer in Cheers Restore and have already ordered my 2nd bottle!

I’ve tried a lot of these different hangover pills, and none of them really work as advertised. I would typically get a headache in the morning after like 4 drinks, but taking this before helped and I woke up with no headache.Now if I’m having 15+ drinks and take this before, I haven’t really noticed a difference with it helping.One thing I do like about these is the pills have like a peppermint smell to them so they actually smell good. All the other ones I’ve taken don’t smell the best.

I like how easy it is to avoid serious hangovers and wake up feeling refreshed. The added essential oil tablet creates an extremely pleasant scent and makes them very easy to take. After serious testing, I found the only time I was let down was when I forgot to take them. They don't mess with my stomach either. I would recommend this regardless if your a light drinker or a party animal.
Review Title: By far my favorite and most successful way to avoid hangovers

Review Text: I’ve been way less hungover than I should be after taking Cheers! My fiancée and I have used Cheers numerous times, and each time we have made a comment about how great it works. It is not a miracle cure; if you overindulged the night before you will still feel the effects the next day. Do not drink more because you have Cheers handy. However, you will feel better than if you had not taken Cheers. It’s great for after an impromptu happy hour or a dinner that goes late when you have work the next day, a workout, etc. Highly recommend!

I was skeptical of this at first, but decided to give it a try since a friend recommended it. I was using flyby before and I believed it kind of worked, but not as effective as I thought and needed to take too many to get job done. After a night of hard drinking, I popped 3 capsules and chugged water before bed. Wake up with no hangover, maybe just slightly tired. The nasty headache, fast HR, sluggish and just feeling off wasn't to be found. I tried it 3 times already and it worked every time. I highly recommend. And just a FYI, I'm a real person and wasn't paid to write this.

I did it 😂 I drank a whole bottle of sweet red wine and went to bed at 2:30am. I woke up the next morning at 8am with the tiniest of a headache but I still got up and made breakfast without hardly noticing anything! Crazy

Was super skeptical but decided to give it a shot and it definitely helps a ton. I took it after a night of HEAVY drinking which normally would’ve had me dead the whole next day, and I was basically fine! Just ordered their whole product line.

Thank you, thank you, thank you! What an amazing product you guys have created! It’s so nice to not waste a whole day feeling terrible after drinking the previous night! After a certain age, hangovers are inevitable and awful. Now I can responsibly enjoy myself, and know that I will be functional the next day :)Thanks again,Yvonne Lewis
You definitely need these if you get nauseous the next day after drinking. These have changed the game for me! I am already ordering my second bottle so I will never run out!
